job_name: 專案經理 Project Manager_台北
cust_name: 昕力資訊股份有限公司
job_detail:
請至 https://tpisoftware.teamdoor.io/s/MUVJBR 投遞履歷，這邊會優先審核喔！

我們昕力資訊是一家規模超過550+人的B2B跨國軟體設計與開發公司，主要提供企業軟體建置與顧問服務，專精於AI智能客服機器人、Fintech與數位銀行、行動壽險、行動App應用、大數據等系統解決方案，並擁有多項自有產品，經營據點跨足台北、新竹、台中、台南、高雄、新加坡及越南。

在現在這個數位轉型的大時代中，為了提供更專業的服務及產品，我們需要優秀的專案經理加入我們的團隊！

【專案經理的工作內容會包含什麼？】
負責領導專案團隊，將公司產品或解決方案如期如預算的成功交付給客戶，工作事項如下：
1. 專案時程規劃與掌控，進度控制與追蹤、文件撰寫等
2. 專案系統功能、架構之規劃與執行，包含與內外部客戶溝通、技術討論與簡報等
3. 整理與搜集專案流程/需求新增與變更的資訊
4. 專案風險控管與排除
5. 專案進度的分析與彙整，並提交專案進度報告
6. 專案完成後的項目驗收與測試
7. 規劃及協調專案團隊成員的工作事項
8. 專案結案後進行專案分析簡報，例如整理專案開發經驗與改善方案等

【我們期望您擁有的特質】
- 人際溝通能力：必須能夠與不同工作職務和不同特質的人相處融洽、與團隊合作無間。
- 高度團隊意識：願意以團隊目標為優先，同時也尊重團隊夥伴有不同的意見。
- 邏輯思辨能力：能夠快速分析每個執行方案的優缺點、可行的替代方案。
- 自主學習能力：積極主動學習相關產業的domain know-how及工作上所需技能。

【我們希望您具備的技能】
1. 良好的溝通協調能力且具高抗壓性。
2. 三年以上軟體開發專案管理實務經驗。 
3. 三年以上SA或SD實務經驗。

【加分項目】
1. 有領導過大型專案經驗佳。
2. 有軟體產業、金融產業相關經驗者佳。

【注意事項】
如果團隊覺得有機會合作，想跟您更深入的交流，我們將會儘速與您聯繫。
若不符合的面試者，將不另行通知，謝謝！

cust_name: 國立成功大學_創新數位內容研究中心
job_detail:
成功大學人工智能數位轉型研究中心致力於發展各項軟硬體整合及AI數位轉型技術，並推動應用於產、官、學界之數位轉型情境之中、我們在校園食安、智慧醫療、精準運科等領域的AIoT及應用系統平台具有深厚的技術實力。

加入我們團隊，您將有機會發揮所學協助上述應用場域執行各項數位轉型專案執行，您的工作內容如下:

【工作內容】 
協助維運團隊:
1. 支援計畫行政業務。
2. 協助客服案件處理。
3. 協助計畫文件撰寫。
4. 資料整理與報表產出。
5. 資訊安全文件管理。
6. 臨時交辦事項。

【條件說明】
一、專業要求
1.具備電腦文書作業(word、power point、excel) 能力
2.具備資料庫CRUD操作及資料庫 Schema 讀取能力者
3.具備計畫文件撰寫能力
4.字斟句酌、文筆流暢
5.具備溝通協調能力

二、人格特質
1.樂觀正向，善於團隊合作與協調溝通
2.主動積極、執行力強、盡心負責，遇錯勇於承擔
3.思維謹慎、行事細心、邏輯力強

【工作地點】台南市東區小東路15號(國立成功大學力行校區) 
【工作時間】週一至週五 08:00~17:00，遇有舉辦相關活動，須配合活動籌備與辦理之時程
【公司福利】出差皆有車資、住宿與膳食費津貼
【需求人數】1人

As a Test Automation Engineer, you will be responsible for specifying, developing, and maintaining test automation tools and frameworks. You must be comfortable doing so in a fast-paced agile environment working closely with Developers, DevOps, and Business Analysis. Continuous improvement of the software test process using the latest methodologies. You can plan, develop, and deliver effective test plans to agreed timescales and solve common problems differently using a variety of methods. You actively participate in the software development process. Knowledge and experience around Test-Driven Development is a strong advantage. You will also research and prototype new technologies and methods to improve the test process.

Minimum qualifications
•	At least 1 years experience working in the testing part of software development life cycle, such as:
1.	Analyze and develop test plan/specification based on requirements
2.	Write test cases with clear descriptions
3.	Execute functional, integration, and end-to-end testing
4.	Analysis of test results and defect tracking until closure
5.	Generate testing report based on the results
•	Experience working in an Agile and Test Driven Development Environment
•	Experience of writing test cases and be able to breakdown a feature into its component parts to identify areas where issues may arise
•	Naturally self-motivated, inquisitive, creative and enjoys operating in a team environment

有興趣都歡迎投遞喔

cust_name: 沛星互動科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Appier is an AI SaaS company on a mission to make AI easy, by making software intelligent. Founded in 2012, Appier has 17 offices across APAC, U.S. and Europe and is listed on the Tokyo Stock Exchange. Visit www.appier.com for more information.


About the role

We are looking for Data Scientists in Taiwan that will be part of our data science team. You will work closely with Machine Learning Scientists, Engineers, and other product related roles to perform data analytics for achieving Appier’s product and business goals.

 

Task of the role

Drive initiatives and experimentations in CrossX product (e.g., enhance the efficiency to deliver ads to end users in real-time-bidding scenarios). 
Evaluate and define product and business metric framework.
Build key data sets/pipelines to empower operational and exploratory analysis.
Conduct data analysis reports to illustrate the results and insight (dashboards, reports)
other:
About you

[Essential]

1. 2+ years of industry experience in the data analytics area.
2. Can write efficient Python scripts for data analysis and job automation.
3. Statistics knowledge and skills, using SQL to do basic data extraction and aggregation. 
4. Sufficient know-how of machine learning and basic experience of using machine learning tools.
5. Fluent in Pandas or PySpark.
6. Good analytical skills to extract meaningful insights from the data.
7. Ability to communicate data analysis insight to audiences with different backgrounds.
8. Proficient oral and written communication skills in English.
 

[Nice to have]

Working experiences in digital advertising industries.

cust_name: 干城數碼有限公司
job_detail:
這份職位將參與知名消費電子品牌數據分析部門專案，與多位資料科學家、資料工程師合作，為企業打造數據加值的解決方案。

我們團隊利用多元的量化分析工具，曾推動多個具有影響力的專案，如「產品銷量預測、零件需求預測、產能規劃最佳化」，應用到的方法包括：機器學習、作業研究、甚至經濟學模型等。歡迎加入我們，一起探索應用更多創造商業影響力的量化分析方法。


Job Responsibility:
1.	與商業分析師合作，設計Data-Driven的商業解決方案 (例如機器學習)，確認解決方案吻合公司的商業需求。
2.	設計、實作量化模型，包含資料清理、釐清資料含意、特徵工程、模型評估等

7. 協助使用者排除ERP系統問題。

job_name: C/C++ Application Engineer 軟體工程師
cust_name: 優必達台灣有限公司
job_detail:
We focus on media and cloud game services with streaming technology.
And we are looking for engineers who enjoy working with frontier devices and consoles.

This job requires solid C/C++ skill, with knowledge to OS architecture, interface hierarchy, and application platforms.
Experience in following would be the plus,
• Knowledge to network and streaming protocols, or
• Experience in media encoder/decoder in video (ex, H.264, HEVC) or audio (ex, AAC, OPUS) codecs, or
• Experience in common application development (ex, Android, iOS, or Unity), or
• Experience in gyro and accelerometer sensor, or HMD tracking.

The responsibility of the position includes,
• Develop the software modules, components on the specific platforms (ex, mobile devices, set-top box, and game consoles).
• Co-work with internal teams on product maintain and customer supports.
• Build prototypes for demonstration and POC.
• Study new technologies and specs to share to team members.

You may ,
• Learn the world's leading streaming technologies.
• Learn the knowledge of application architecture and cross-platform knowhow.
• Have access to a wide range of devices and platforms.
• Cooperation with world-wide and well-known companies and game titles.

job_name: 【美商上市獨角獸】Sr. Software Engineer (Android BSP/Framework) - 提供WFH選擇
cust_name: ROBERT WALTERS_華德士股份有限公司
job_detail:
- Job 1. Sr. Software Engineer (Android BSP) -
【Key Responsibilities】: 
● Lead platform features and make solid technical decisions keeping software quality, security, and maintainability in mind.
● Develop and design the next generation of the Android platform of the company’s product.
● Help set the standard for software quality by adopting modern software test frameworks and practices in daily development.
● Collaborate with Software, Hardware, Factory, and Product Management teams on the product roadmap and requirements to build a long-term vision for the company’s device capabilities.
● Grow and develop team members through coaching and feedback.
【Key Requirements】:
● BS. engineering degree with at least 5 years of software development experience, including 2 years of experience working with embedded device software. 
● Android OS or Linux Kernel bring-up / BSP (Board Support Package) experience.
● Proficient in C/C++, Java, or other object-oriented programming languages.
● Experience working with source control tools such as Git, Gerrit, GitHub, and with Android command line tools such as adb and fastboot.
● Experience writing or integrating, and debugging device drivers e.g. display, power management, GPIO drivers, or similar.
● Experience working with Hardware teams to review and analyze product schematics.
● Passionate about solving large-scale problems and building great software for customers.
● Technical experience on multi-person projects.
[Plus]:
● Experience working with bootloaders, Linux device tree configuration, Android HAL (Hardware Abstraction Layer), or HIDL (HAL interface definition language).
● Experience in the Android Networking Stack and Android security model (SE Linux policy) usage.
● Experience with Google’s AOSP architecture developing Android framework services, Android Native applications (JNI / NDK) or system applications in JAVA or Kotlin.
● Experience working with SOC (system on chip) vendors.
● Experience in wireless protocol development or implement on electronic products 

- Job 2. Software Engineer (Android Framework) - 
【Key Responsibilities】: 
● Develop and design the next generation of the company’s Android Platform with a focus on the Android Framework.
● Design for Android OS Framework updates that are easy to maintain and upgrade when new OS versions are available.
● Cooperate with Software, Hardware, Factory, and Product Management teams on the product roadmap and requirements to build a long-term vision for the company’s device capabilities.
● Develop platform features and make solid technical decisions keeping software quality, security, and maintainability in mind.
● Partner with SOC vendors and ODM’s to design and develop high-performance and easy-to-use devices for the company’s customers.
● Assist to set the standard for software quality by adopting modern software test frameworks and practices in daily development.
【Key Requirements】:
● BS. engineering degree with over 2 years of experience working with Android OS software at the AOSP Framework layer.
● Android experience designing multi-layer architectures that would expand from Application to Framework and Kernel layer.
● Experience with Google’s AOSP architecture developing Android framework services, Android Native applications (JNI / NDK), or system applications in JAVA or Kotlin.
● Experience working with HIDL (HAL interface definition language).
● Experience developing features that require interactions with different Android OS blocks like WiFi, Camera, USB, etc.
● Experience debugging issues within the Android Framework and Linux Kernel.
● Proficient in C/C++, Java, or other object-oriented programming languages.
● Experience working with source control tools such as Git, Gerrit, and GitHub, and with Android command line tools such as adb and fastboot.
● Passionate about solving large-scale problems and building great software for customers.
● Technical experience on multi-person projects.

job_name: 〔DS - Decision Support〕Business System Analyst 美商,自由開放的組織文化
cust_name: 英諾瓦資訊科技服務有限公司
job_detail:
The Business System Analyst (BSA) will work closely with Product Management and Software Engineering to understand the business needs, translate these into functional and technical requirements, and verify implementation to ensure that the product vision and goals are met. The BSA is a key liaison between Product Management and Software Engineering and is responsible for ensuring that functional and technical requirements are understood, and that the technology solutions meet the acceptance criteria. The analyst will take ownership of features, user stories, acceptance criteria, and any additional requirements artifacts. 

Key Responsibilities:
1. Formulates features, user stories, and acceptance criteria. Collaborates with software developers to research existing business and system processes. Leads and documents requirements definition sessions with business and technical stakeholders to better understand functional, technical, data, user interface, and non-functional requirements. 

2. Performs functional and technical acceptance testing of development deliverables to verify they meet the business and functional requirements.  Participates in release planning activities as scheduled.  

3.Identifies opportunities for improving quality and efficiency and participates in process improvement initiatives.

Must Have:
•	2+ years in defining functionality requirements 
•	Ability to multi-task and react positively to frequent changes in priorities.
•	Ability to communicate verbally in a succinct and clear manner to technical and non-technical audiences. Strong English skills are required. 
•	Ability to build working relationships with technology and product management teams.
•	High level of project organization, attention to detail, and time management.
•	High level of motivation to solve existing problems while anticipating new issues.

job_detail:
你所追求的工作是什麼？是寫【程式】，還是打造會讓你感到驕傲的【產品】?

在鈦坦，我們稱呼工程師為「產品開發者」（PD, Product Developer），我們不僅單純的寫【程式】把功能完成，並且考慮到效能、安全、使用性、維護成本、以及花費的資源與時間等因素所造成的影響。 在分析及評估所有影響要素後，達到客戶滿意的產出，才是我們對開發【產品】的要求！

你一定聽過敏捷式開發，但是你真正了解什麼是敏捷式開發嗎？
是很快速的把程式寫完？還是只是一堆似懂非懂的名詞？
如果你／妳自認具備【熱忱】、【追求極致】、【樂於團隊合作】的特質，
我們歡迎你／妳一起加入鈦坦科技的開發團隊
在這個大家庭裡，你將會在專業敏捷開發顧問的協助下
學習到敏捷式開發的精髓，並且實際運用敏捷開發的框架，與團隊一起打造極致的產品。 
我們堅信：沒有最好，只有更好！

•	依據客戶的需求，開發並維護高效能、高安全性、使用者易用的網站應用程式。
•	整合網站應用程式至資料庫導向或 API 導向的後台系統。
•	提供 24x7 的技術支援。
•	開發、改善所有軟體產品，並提供維護所需的所有必要文件。

Familiar in one or more of them:

• Object-Oriented Language.
• Server side skills. (.NET, MSSQL, MySQL...)
• Automation test skills. (NUnit, TestCafe...)
• Operation skills. (Docker, Kubernetes, GitLab, Jenkins, ELK, Grafana...)
• Cloud services. (GCP, AWS...)
• Frontend skills. (JavaScript, jQuery, Vue.js, TypeScript...)
language: 中文:聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通, 英文:聽 /略懂、說 /略懂、讀 /略懂、寫 /略懂
other: 敏捷開發

cust_name: 台灣東芝全球商業解決方案有限公司
job_detail:
The company

Toshiba is a provider of technology services for retail businesses to create high-quality digital platforms and products that accelerate time to market. Our diverse and adaptable teams provide the right mix of solutions and methodologies to deliver results as we collaborate with our clients' teams to foster innovation through continuous learning.

Our people

At Toshiba, all team members are empowered to take responsibility and develop innovative solutions to our customers' most challenging problems. To retain and develop top talent, we foster a work environment that celebrates creativity, encourages skill development, and enables multidisciplinary collaboration.

What you will bring to the team:

This role is for an experienced Software developer who will work with the latest technologies in the marketplace to help our customers modernize and transform their business.  This candidate must have knowledge in all stages of software development.

What you will be doing:

Your typical day as a Toshiba Software Engineer / Java will involve:

This opportunity will provide the candidate the chance to work on a microservices based platform and help code and design functional deliverables.

You'll be working alongside other experienced engineers and developers, collaborating on the various layers of the infrastructure for our platform.

Naturally to be successful in this role, you must have and know of

* Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related field
* 5+ years professional experience in software development
* Computer Science fundamentals in object-oriented design
* Computer Science fundamentals in functional programming
* Computer Science fundamentals in algorithm design, problem solving, and complexity analysis
* Experience with Cloud based applications
* Experience in communicating with users, other technical teams, and management to collect requirements, describe software product features and technical designs
* English: Fluent

Preferred qualifications:

* Knowledge of professional software engineering, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations
* Experience with distributed computing and enterprise-wide systems
* Development experience for web, mobile and desktop applications
* Hands-on expertise in many disparate technologies, typically ranging from front-end user interfaces through to back-end systems and all points in between
* Familiarity with Scrum process is a plus

Specific responsibilities for this position include:
* Java programming
* Product specification creation and management - decomposing requirements, developing specifications and communicating specifications and requirements to development suppliers.
* Support hardware product development - ensuring design specifications and quality requirements are met through design reviews and product test phases.
* Support the debug of complex problems found during product development including identifying risks, technical problems and recommending solutions.  
* Product life cycle support – providing technical engineering support for cost reductions, EOL components, and field issues.  
* Experience working in a cross-functional, collaborative environment across multiple sites

cust_name: 定贏傳媒股份有限公司
job_detail:
我們是 WINWIN MEDIA 定贏傳媒，自2009年起即以數位廣告行銷代理商作為起步，
逐步拓展經營觸角，並在2020年起，逐漸轉向自主開發數位產品及服務，
也在同年成功推出自己開發的短視頻 APP，
直至今日，會員人數已突破百萬，下載量快速成長中，
且擁有每日數萬個活躍用戶，平均每分鐘皆有 500位 會員同時在線。

我們將以此為經驗，於今年再推出跨境電商及交友APP，因而擴大徵才，
集結中國及台灣的開發團隊從PM -> UX -> UI -> Developer -> QA 一應俱全，
扁平化的組織管理，能更有效率的溝通並交流分享技術資訊。

iOS團隊使用 SwiftUI+Combine 採用MVVM設計模式進行開發 App，
並追求高品質的程式碼(UnitTest)、自動化打包、最流暢的效能及最穩定的產品有願景，
對自己的技術能力有信心，也熱愛挑戰
我們誠摯邀請你/妳 加入我們

職缺條件：
．熟悉 Swift 語法與 UIKit 或 SwiftUI 框架。
．曾使用過 MVVM 或 MVC 設計模式。
．曾串接 RESTful API，對 HTTP 有基礎認識。

job_name: 資深軟體工程師 Senior Software Engineer
cust_name: FAZZ_新加坡商迅星金融科技有限公司台灣分公司
job_detail:
## About the Team

You will be contributing to a new product launch that would unite various business units and internal core systems that would be the lifeblood and primary focus of our entire organization in the years ahead. 

We are really excited about the possibilities of changing the way payments and business banking are done, and with our unique proprietary model, we are able to derive innovative unit economics which no other competitors are able to replicate. 

## About the Role

This is a role with a lot of opportunity for impact. We are looking to scale our engineering team from scratch in various countries such as Vietnam, Taiwan, Malaysia, and many more. 

As the team is rapidly expanding in scope and size, you would be entrusted with many opportunities to coach and to mentor your team. This is a great learning opportunity for you in helping others to be a better version of themselves.

You would be making a direct impact on our product launch and contributing to something meaningful that would help improve the way businesses are done in Singapore, Indonesia, and in the future - South East Asia.

## What you'll do

- Being responsible for the overall health and productivity of the engineers within your team
- Providing feedback on architecture and approach and helping teams make data-driven decisions
- Having an overview of what’s happening across the organization and collaborating with other engineering teams to build the product
- Code reviews and code implementation
- Designing complex systems in a microservices architecture
- Hiring and interviewing engineers for the team
- The ability to read and write frontend is a bonus
- Full autonomy in deriving impact – we believe people and teams are most empowered when they can act autonomously. You’ll work with your team to create a vision of your own on how to launch the ahead of our competitors

## What we're looking for in you

- 3+ years of relevant backend engineering experience, familiar with MVC frameworks such as Golang, Ruby on Rails, or any JS web frameworks
- Expertise in SQL, database design, and writing optimal SQL queries.
- Deep Knowledge of RESTful APIs
- Proficient user of Git and GitHub
- Evidence of understanding system design and being able to build a new system from scratch
- Evidence of ability to maintain and scale a system

## Nice to haves

- Experience with building intelligent, risk decision systems
- Interested in financial systems, security and financial crime
- Experience in developing on a large legacy production codebase
- Experience with developing and managing MQ or Kafka messaging systems
- Relevant experience in Payments, Retail or Consumer Financial Services
- Experience in development in a zero-downtime CI/CD environment

specialty: Github, Git, Java, PHP, Ruby, Node.js

◆ 設計和開發商業邏輯 API 與前端（web/iOS/Android） 互動。
◆ 維護現有的後端功能包括但不限於：即時通訊、SMS、email、MQTT、cloud storage (AWS/阿里雲)、Mobile Push、外部系統整合、任務分派系統、計價、資料分析和搜尋引擎。
◆ 研究相關領域新知，保持知識分享團隊文化。
◆ 以 project team (scrum) 形式與前端開發人員，UI/X 設計，QA 以及 PM/PO 協作。系統維護方面與 OP/IT/CICD/SRE 等團隊共同促進系統穩定度。

First month Expectation
- 了解團隊運作現狀，團隊目標，摸索目前產品功能。
- 搭建自己的工作環境，熟悉當前的部屬環境與 git policy。
- 學會 golang，(如果原本不會的話)。
- 藉由 code review，了解團隊的 coding pattern 和設計原則。
- 在 mentor 的協助下，完成交付的工作。
- 與主管確認試用期(前三個月)通過標準。

First three months Expectation
- 進入 Feature 專案開發團隊，在 senior member 的帶領下交付專案。整個專案過程會參與需求確認、討論、系統分析、實作開發、測試、部屬。
- 藉由開發過程了解團隊運作，team code pattern，縮短 code review gating period。
- 與主管定期 1-1 確認狀況，確保熟悉團隊方向，滿足試用期通過標準。

First six months Expectation
- 從專案開發經驗能慢慢接手做部分component owner，或是成為 component backup。
- 能處理負責範圍內 e2e 的 issue，能協調PM和前端同事共同解決問題。
- 持續參與團隊流程和活動回饋，促使團隊持續進步。
- 與 Team Lead 討論下一階段的職涯規劃。

job_name: QA 軟體測試工程師  -台北
cust_name: 盈通管理顧問有限公司
job_detail:
工程師崗位<<每月>>皆有績效，KPI最高為底薪的50% 

應徵流程：
1. CV請務必清楚描述過去工作相關經歷/作品，建議可將每段工作經歷文字描述，並包含以下內容：【項目/開發環境/使用工具/工作內容】
2. 通過CV篩選後，會安排Zoom線上面試
3. 面試官皆為跨國優秀工程師，會依據測試技術項目和面試結果給予職級評等核薪


能力需求：
1、三年以上測試工作經驗

2、制定測試計劃並負責版本各階段測試工作

3、了解接口協定(Interface protocol)相關知識，熟悉測試工具使用

4、掌握SQL語句使用

工作內容：
1、配合事業部產品、研發目標的流程推進與執行
2、遵循品質特性、範疇及流程，確保產品功能、性能滿足業務需求
3、從用戶角度對各個版本通過專業測試方法和工具進行整體測試和體驗
4、對需求文件進行分析，代碼品質進行有效的反饋和監控，達成版本的高效率推進、高品質交付和用戶體驗提升
skill: 功能測試(function test), 使用者測試(Usability test), 問題追蹤處理(Bug tracking), 軟體整合測試, 測試環境建置規劃, 測試計劃及測試報告書撰寫, 軟體程式設計

cust_name: PHOENIX TECHNOLOGIES INC_美商費尼克斯有限公司台灣分公司
job_detail:
Overview
Design, develop and maintain an OpenBMC solution that is tightly integrated with Phoenix UEFI server firmware. Working with a team of BMC and UEFI engineers, ensure our solution is robust, compatible with industry standards, feature-rich, customizable and secure.  Help to develop documentation (requirements, user guides, release notes) and training material.  May be asked to work closely with OEM or ODM customers to deploy to customer hardware. 

Responsibilities
•	Work closely with management, peers & customers to develop requirements for a BMC product
•	Work closely with UEFI team to ensure interoperability between BMC and UEFI platform firmware
•	Work closely with design & QA teams on UI and usability
•	Assist in powering on new platforms
•	Debug hardware and firmware issues
•	Support bug and security fixes through a product’s lifecycle
•	Develop original code and solutions for customization and value-add features

Qualifications
•	BS in Electrical Engineering, Computer Science/Engineering or equivalent, or 5+ years in firmware or software development
•	3+ years experience with BMC firmware, preferably OpenBMC
•	Experience with BMC hardware, preferably AST 2500
•	Experience with IPMI and VUE
•	Proficiency in C or C++
•	Strong debugging skills
•	Must work well both with a team and independently
major: 資訊工程相關 其他數學及電算機科學相關
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等
skill: 韌體工程開發, 韌體程式設計
other:

job_name: JGnet網路管理員(林口區)起薪35K，無經驗歡迎挑戰
cust_name: 宅急網股份有限公司
job_detail:
我們公司已有20年經營經驗，有良好的師徒制度，手把手帶你跨過任何困難，遇到任何問題我們都是一個團隊，絕不會放你一人孤軍奮戰。目前團隊年紀都很輕，但都有強烈企圖心，期望未來加入的你跟我們一起成長，一起賺取高薪！在這裡，你的每一分努力都不會被忽略，都能為自己獲得一定程度的獎金與分紅。
如果你覺得你有優秀的解決問題能力，不怕與陌生人交談，有良好的溝通協調表達，不怕風吹日曬雨淋，願意學習、吃苦挑戰自己，期待自己有更進一步成長，我們正在尋找這樣的你！

●工作內容：
1.為住戶安裝網路，並在安裝完畢後進行測試。
2.排除住戶網路異常問題，確保可順利上網。
3.主機監控與設備更換、維護。
4.幹線建置與維護。
5.受理客戶諮詢，介紹方案內容。
6.主管交辦事項。

●薪資待遇：
起薪35000元，通過三個月試用期後，再享每個月2400元伙食津貼，視學習狀況一年內調整到38000元，一年之後視公司制度調薪。
滿一年後，可參與季獎金分配與年度分紅，再享一次全額補助的國外旅遊。
對於不想只領取固定薪水，願意為自己賺取更多獎金的高手，歡迎來挑戰這份職務。只要你肯拚，願意吃苦忍受挫折，經過一年後的完整培訓，未來挑戰百萬年薪不是夢。

●職工福利：
除勞基法基本勞工福利之外，另有:
1.不定期舉行公司聚餐
2.年終尾牙摸彩
3.年資滿一年後，每年享一次全額補助的國內外旅遊，滿一定年資，可再享一次資深員工全額補助的國內外旅遊
4.自由的排休，而且是比照公務員的假期天數


如對工作有興趣想更瞭解詳情，歡迎聯絡曾先生0977-353-044
●更詳細的公司內容與員工工作心得，歡迎瀏覽本公司網站 https://www.jgnet.tw

job_detail:
About Software Developer at Nogle

We are looking for a junior talented and enthusiastic software developer to join a experienced and diverse team to build up exciting high-volume, low-latency fintech products. You will collaborate with other developers to work on all functions of software design and coding.  

To ensure success as a junior developer, you should have a good understanding of some programming languages, good problem solving skills, and the ability to lean new technology quickly. The fundamentals in terms of data structures and algorithms are also important your success.

Duties and Responsibilities:

-Collaborate with team members on designing, developing, unit-testing applications.
-Design data structures and utilize appropriate design patterns to model and Implement business logic.
-Document source code and generate readable API documentations.
-Share know-how with colleague and partners that gain from our experience and technical expertise on the field.  
-Apply technical expertise to investigate and resolve customer software issues

Requirements and Qualifications:

-Bachelor’s degree in computer science or equivalent field.
-Strong analytical and exceptional problem-solving skills.
-Familiar with at least one of the following languages (Java(preferred), Javascript, C++, Python)
-Experience with relational databases. 
-Easy adaptation to new programming languages/technologies/platforms
-Excellent communication skills

job_detail:
SKILLS & EXPERIENCE
•Under-Graduate / Post-Graduate, major in Finance, Management engineering, IT, Mathematics, Computer Science, etc.
• A highly analytical brain and possess strong problem-solving skills.
• A consultative approach and ability to present conclusions at senior management 
level.

• Strong interest in data analysis and modeling
• Good at analytics tool and mindset, basically expert on Excel. better if senior analysis tool, such as BI, multi-dimensional analysis
• Knowledge of basic accounting
• Strong passion in technology and system
• (Preferred) Relevant academic qualifications (Finance, Management engineering, Mathematics or Computer Science related)
• (Preferred) Experience or skills in Programming or coding 

 

RESPONSIBILITY
• Learning TM1 Skills, Financial Analytics, and Consulting Skills
• Shadowing the project
• Deliver Performance Management solutions using Accounting, FP&A and data modeling knowledge and expertise
• Requirements and prototyping/design workshops 
• Design, Develop, & Implement TM1 Applications (incl. Dimension, Cube, RULE, 
TI, Input/Report Templates), apply and promote the Best Practices
• Develop & Implement ETL (incl. back end databases, OLAP and relational, as 
required), apply and promote the Best Practices
• Evaluate & Optimize the performance of TM1 solution
• Document, apply and promote the Best Practices
• Training and enablement workshops
• Build and foster strong client relationships at the implementation level and above 
as available, gaining credibility and trust
• Resolve first level customer issues in a timely and responsive manner



PEOPLE WHO
•	Are curious and intuitive in their approach
•	Have a genuine desire to help people become their best
•	Have a passion for working with customers to solve business problems
•	Like to collaborate in multicultural environments
•	Are not afraid to take risks, motivate others and celebrate wins, both big and small


* Have less TM1 related experience? No warries! We offer every new employee a systematic TM1 learning training at beginning. 
[PS:  TM1是IBM的多維專業分析軟體，針對於TM1，我們會提供全面的培訓。考慮重點在於您目前財務資料分析建模的技能]

我們是一家全球化的外資諮詢公司，致力於基於TM1為大型跨國集團/公司定製專屬的分析/計劃類軟體。 我們的崗位為數據分析建模型財務諮詢顧問，作為FP&A方向的BI諮詢顧問，協助客戶優化財務/經營方向需求，尋求解決方案。 Cubewise的諮詢顧問不單單只是BI方面的設計開發，更是為客戶提供商業分析、財務優化等需求的解決者。 我們正在尋找財務分析方向 和數據分析方向的 候選人。

job_name: QA 測試工程師 Quality Assurance Enginer
cust_name: 微拓科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
▎身為 beBit TECH 的 QA Engineer, 你的任務是...
．與開發團隊合作，熟悉開發流程，協助團隊改進整體的開發體系，提升產品穩定性
．提升團隊核心功能的測試覆蓋率，確保產品每次更新都能給使用者良好的體驗
．針對各項功能制定測試計畫書及測試案例
．建立並執行複雜的功能測試
．構建自動化框架提升測試效率，並套用在合適的測試情境（API/UI/效能）
．記錄測試期間的問題，對 bug 追蹤並做優先級排序
．分析測試資料、釐清問題並提出改善建議
．將測試相關資訊撰寫成文件供他人參考
．能夠從用戶角度出發，模擬用戶需求及實際使用場景
．根據產品功能及需求，撰寫 Test Case 及產出 Test Report

※不局限於手動測試或自動化測試，歡迎對軟體測試有興趣者一同加入。

▎我們希望你具備以下能力及經驗
．熟悉各種測試 (功能/整合/回歸/壓力/API)
．熟悉測試工具 (Jmeter/Fiddler/Postman/Chrome console)
．Python 或 Javascript 等語言或其他自動化工具 ( Cypress, Selenium, Puppeteer )
．具有 API 測試自動化經驗 
．具有 Scrum 內開發自動化測試經驗
．有實際建置 CI (Continuous Integration)  的經驗
．對於流程最佳化有熱情，在每次相似的任務中持續進步

▎團隊合作與文化
．Scrum & git flow
．兩週一次 Sprint Meeting 與每週三次的 Stand-up Meeting
．重視成員產出與 ownership
．平均每週 release 2 次
．Bi-weekly Engineer Sharing，和高手們切磋交流最新技術

cust_name: 新加坡商鈦坦科技股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_detail:
你所追求的工作是什麼？是寫【程式】，還是打造會讓你感到驕傲的【產品】?

在鈦坦，我們稱呼工程師為「產品開發者」（PD, Product Developer），我們不僅單純的寫【程式】把功能完成，並且考慮到效能、安全、使用性、維護成本、以及花費的資源與時間等因素所造成的影響。 在分析及評估所有影響要素後，達到客戶滿意的產出，才是我們對開發【產品】的要求！

你一定聽過敏捷式開發，但是你真正了解什麼是敏捷式開發嗎？
是很快速的把程式寫完？還是只是一堆似懂非懂的名詞？
如果你／妳自認具備【熱忱】、【追求極致】、【樂於團隊合作】的特質，
我們歡迎你／妳一起加入鈦坦科技的開發團隊
在這個大家庭裡，你將會在專業敏捷開發顧問的協助下
學習到敏捷式開發的精髓，並且實際運用敏捷開發的框架，與團隊一起打造極致的產品。 
我們堅信：沒有最好，只有更好！

1.	開發 Flutter-based native apps
2.	可配合 24x7 技術支援輪班，協助客戶排除系統問題
3.	使用App與後端API串接的實作(包含使用者認證、資料交換等）
4.	協助評估開發時程
5.	自動化測試撰寫，優化現有程式碼及使用流程

• 此職缺為台中職缺。
• 面試請附上作品集。

specialty: Git, Java, Objective-C, SWIFT, Kotlin, Flutter, ReactNative

job_detail:
您喜歡幫助客戶改善財務狀況嗎？無論您的專長是什麼，將您的熱情和客戶服務帶入您的工作中，都讓它閃耀。由於您對公司產品和服務的貢獻、連接和共享，客戶能夠實現他們的目標和夢想。這就是為什麼我們不斷重塑零售體驗，讓我們的客戶能夠實現他們的財務和生活方式目標。

職務概述：
我們正在尋找一位充滿服務熱忱、樂於接受挑戰與創新的夥伴加入我們。這個角色將要負責解決二大部分問題：管理分公司總務事務及電腦與應用軟體使用問題事宜。

工作職責：
1. 負責日常總務庶務，與即時處理各種突發狀況，讓同仁可以安心工作：
  - 優化與執行分公司例行設備檢測、保養計畫，確保設備使用安全
  - 各項設備簡易維修：照明設備、事務機器、UPS、發電機及散熱水塔
  - 負責日常採購簽呈相關作業、與固定資產管理造冊 
2. 與總公司科技部門合作，確保資訊相關問題被即時處理各：     
  - 作業系統與各資訊系統的盤點、使用管理與問題盤查     
  - 解決同仁與客戶端電腦與應用軟體使用問題事宜     
  - 辦公、通訊電話與資訊設備的盤點、增減、使用管理及修繕、維護
3. 主管交辦事項之辦理與執行
other:
● 熟悉電腦網路資訊維護
● 熟悉 Windows/MacOS 作業系統與應用軟體的安裝、操作、維護及問題排查流程
● 良好的溝通與協調能力，能獨立作業並能持續改善作業效率

● 具備券商或金融業資訊及總務經驗尤佳

cust_name: AmazingTalker_香港商驚奇學習有限公司台灣分公司
job_detail:
【只處理透過以下連結申請的應徵者】
https://bit.ly/3eJmQw6

【About Us】
AmazingTalker 致力建立一個全方位的線上教學平台，讓任何人都可以找到最適合自己的家教，以不斷提昇線上教師收入為使命。自 2016 年 12 月創辦以來，在 60 多個國家和地區，累積超過 110 萬註冊用戶、起過 7000 位線上家教。2020 年入選「親子天下」的【教育新創20+】，2021 年入選【AAMA台北搖籃計劃】。我們目標是成為台灣教育新創界第一間「獨角獸」，讓世界看見台灣。歡迎你在應徵前到 http://bit.ly/atculturetw 了解更多 AmazingTalker 的企業文化、人才特質、團隊成員見證等資訊。

我們正在招募「Junior Backend Engineer」，將會與公司內不同的團隊合作，透過 Mentor 學習和理解不同團隊的運作方式，並透過技術優化組織的運行效率。AmazingTalker是迭代成長快速的團隊，如果你嚮往能夠持續學習並發揮極大影響力， 歡迎你加入與團隊一起跑得更快。
★ 如果你有以下特質，將會非常適合這個職位★
- 熱衷於解決具有挑戰性的問題，面對未知、複雜而抽象的問題能拆解成小部分，再以有系統的方式，把各個小問題解決。
- 不限制自己的學習和工作任務，會不斷尋找更適合的技術、工具或流程，只要能夠解決問題，你會想盡辦法嘗試！
- 有強烈的驅動自己成長動能，展現強烈的執行力，渴望為長期目標發揮影響力。

【Why you should join us】
-拓展全球：打造世界級的服務架構，挑戰我們在全球各地指數式成長的流量
-指數式成長：團隊、流量、各種營收數據指標成長，加入我們一起挑戰未來
-資訊透明：我們沒有會議，但有詳盡且完整的紀錄，沿著脈絡了解團隊的每個細節
-Data Driven：跟夥伴一起挖掘數據、設計系統架構，讓數據說話並親手改變這個產品
-技術成長：過去一年我們翻修了許多細節 containerized, clusterized, CI/CD, multi-layer monitoring system, centralized modules...。未來只會有更多，跟著我們一起成長！
-OKR：我們透過關鍵指標逐步推導出需要完成的事情，我們每個人都是!

想了解AmazingTalker 後端團隊的技術分享嗎？https://bit.ly/3VrF3Pz

了解完整職缺內容及應徵請至以下連結：
https://bit.ly/3eJmQw6

【我們希望你是..】
-歡迎應屆畢業生申請
-擁有與不同領域夥伴合作開發經驗，能釐清不同專業思考下需求
-熟悉 SQL、API 串接相關開發經驗
-良好的溝通與傾聽技能，學習能力強

【如果你有這些經驗會更適合我們！】
非必要，但如果有，或是您很想學會更棒 !
-擁有 Ruby on Rails 開發經驗（我們目前主服務使用的框架）
-擁有第三方工具串接經驗，金流、通知或是電子郵件皆可
-擁有電商平台或其他網路產業開發經驗或背景知識
-擁有自動化、背景排程工作開發的經驗

cust_name: 今網智慧科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
Hi, 智生活平台產品團隊擴編中！我們正在尋找資料分析人才

今網智生活主要以社區為原點，打造整合性社區週邊服務的平台，致力於透過智生活服務平台創造智慧社區與智慧生活，目前團隊負責平台商業模式如下：
 智慧社區物業管理平台：物業管理、智慧社區AIOT應用
 社區O2O生活服務平台：寄件、叫車、洗衣、家電清洗等居家服務
 還有更多正在長大的商業模式：廣告、訂閱制服務等等

。
【工作內容】
一、統整及管理企業內部數據應用需求，並轉化為開發/系統規格
1. 與RD協作設計企業應用資料庫(含CRM、產品DB、訂單DB等等)，追蹤並管理RD資料探勘、處理、分析、匯總的架構設計
2. 接收內部數據分析需求，執行分析工作，產出結論與洞見
3. 負責內部同仁日常營運所需之數據分析工具教育訓練
4. 管理數據分析/資料處理相關的專案，需熟練跨部門溝通&協作

二、依循數據驅動設計，負責智生活產品潛在商機及解決方案的應用分析及判讀
1.依據團隊客戶行為分析、畫像(persona)描繪，進行解釋與預測，並撰寫分析報告(如預測趨勢或客戶行為)，並設計Persona分群貼標與應用評估架構。

職務需求
【必備條件】
1.高度數據導向，擅長透過數據分析解讀，優化商業營運績效。
2.熟悉資料庫、特徵工程、機器學習，以及大數據架構與經驗佳
3.主動積極，抗壓性高，團隊配合度高，具資料可視化及簡報能力
4.良好的溝通協調能力，整合公司產品、設計、市場團隊等各方面資源，進行有效溝通。
5. 具備向上、水平管理之能力，邏輯清晰面對需求能夠迅速分析，找出最佳解決方案。
6. 具備自主學習能力，面對問題及挑戰能自行在專業能力定期精進及成長，成為團隊成長的動能

【加分條件】
1.資料科學/數據分析/資料工程相關經驗
2.具SQL資料庫程式撰寫能力
3.具Python資料分析及資料工程程式能力

【工作文化】
目標導向、敏捷迭代
所有功能開發及決策都是為了追求的是具體成效，例如收益增加多少，點擊率提升多少，並透過規劃及執行的持續迭代，直到目的達成為止。
當責文化、自主決策
你將需要協助團隊做出對公司最好的決策，並爭取公司資源投入你的專案，可行性評估包括事前的相關數據搜集分析、風險評估、利益關係人分析。
年輕開放、高成長性
設計團隊年輕，彼此可以獨立作業，也可以相互支持，具有活潑、熱情的工作氛圍。

如果你符合以下特質，請盡快與我們聯繫
1、熱衷於設計真正有價值的商業模式或服務
2、勇於挑戰，不怕失敗，只怕沒機會嘗試
3、不受限既有的思維模式，勇於帶領自己與他人突破與創新
4、解決顧客問題，為顧客創造WOW的使用體驗會讓你感到非常有成就感
5、兼具理性與感性，能夠理性的產品設計與資訊架構，也能創造感性的顧客體驗
6、樂與分享，願意接納別人想法，同時透過回饋想法跟意見，讓產品變得更好
other: 有經驗尤佳

job_name: Backend Engineer | 後端工程師 (Moneybook麻布記帳 / invos發票存摺)
cust_name: 麻布數據科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
invos發票存摺是市面上功能最貼近生活的消費管理 App，累積超過 600 萬次下載量，為台灣發票應用 App 第一名。發票存摺持續透過巨量資料分析與智能化推薦，串連用戶與品牌通路商，為消費生活提供更多元的可能性，也讓使用者不只是存發票記錄消費，還能享有更多通路優惠與回饋！
引客數據以超過15億筆發票的去識別化巨量數據為基礎，即時精準洞察消費行為、商品銷售變化、及產業與通路營業趨勢，提供客戶最適切的策略方案，顛覆過往的消費行為。

Moneybook 麻布記帳，是全台第一個提供帳戶整合的 FinTech App，目前已支援全台近 40 家金融機構的帳戶資料，也是首家通過 ISO/IEC 27001 國際資安標準驗證的金融科技應用公司。Moneybook 麻布記帳從 Open Banking 領域中出發，未來不僅只是記帳上的創新，更持續致力於 Personal Financial Management (PFM) 的發展，達到普惠金融的願景！

【你會在麻布數據科技集團做些什麼】
1. 公司會根據同事專業技術以及期望，分派至不同團隊參與產品開發。
2. 也許你將參與 invos發票存摺後端系統架構開發，包含：
        (a) 設計易維護、測試、能夠承受百萬流量負載的後端系統
        (b) 負責 GCP 架構設計、維運和效能調校 (GCE、GKE、BigQuery、Cloud SQL 等)
        (c) 負責 Backend 架構 / API 架構設計和重構
        (d) 數據平台建置
        (e) 產品功能需求開發
2. 也許你將參與 Moneybook麻布記帳，後端系統維運和產品開發，包含：
        (a) 負責 GCP 架構維運 (GCE、GKE、Loadbalancer、BigQuery、Cloud SQL 等)
        (b) 負責 Backend 架構 / API 架構維運
        (c) 數據平台維運
        (e) 產品功能需求開發
3. 負責 ISO 27001 維運，執行相關流程作業。

【你會跟這樣的團隊一起工作】
1. 我們重視開發流程，也有完整的開發流程，希望你也是 :)
2. 我們熱衷於產品開發，願意分享也樂於學習新技術，彼此交流，教學相長。
3. 團隊以 Scrum 方式進行開發，有頻繁的跨團隊溝通，與 PM、UI/UX 設計師密切合作。
4. 團隊給予成員參與其他專案的彈性空間，不論你想接觸大數據、機器學習或是資料庫，都有無限發展與機會。

【我們需要這樣的你】
1. 有 Python 或是 TypeScript (Node.js) 語言的模組化 和 refactor 的經驗
2. 對於任一 RDBMS 資料庫操作和維運 (PostgreSQL, MySQL, MariaDB …) 不陌生
3. 瞭解 Docker
4. 熟悉 Git
5. 有系統架構規劃經驗或例子(Monolithic vs Microservices)
6. 有語言建立 API resful server or swagger 經驗

【加分但不是必須】
1. 有 CI/CD (github or gitlab or jekins...) 經驗
2. 使用過 Cloud (gcp or aws) k8s
3. 有 graphql(了解 schema, resolver) 經驗
4. 瞭解 streaming, realtime communication method, pub/sub 的運用情境
5. 瞭解 event queue or broker 的運用情境

【除了履歷，我們也希望能有更多資訊認識你】
 1. 個人網站、部落格
 2. Github, codepen 或是作品集
 3. 對外公開分享的簡報或影片
major: 資訊工程相關 資訊管理相關
specialty: Git, Python, MySQL, PostgreSQL, RDBMS, JavaScript, Node.js
skill: 系統架構規劃, 系統整合分析, 軟體程式設計, 資料庫系統管理維護, 資料庫程式設計

job_name: Python / Django 開發工程師 (3 年以上)
cust_name: 股感資訊股份有限公司
job_detail:
【工作內容】

此職缺會協同數位 Python 工程師、數據工程師與架構師共同規劃與打造行為數據平台，主要用於收集、分析行為數據、同時導入行為分類模型後運行自動化腳本，最終完成數據化運營及成效監控等機制。工作過程中需不斷習慣處理各式數據 (ETL)，探索分析數據進行導入，需熟悉 Python ，並具有 Django 應用程式開發經驗，理解排程與平行運算機制，從而妥善處理程式對系統所帶來的耗能。 若您對 Django 尚不熟悉，請勿投遞此職缺。


  

剛開始時，您主要是與團隊協作，共同完成數據平台上的既有規劃與開發工作，同時協助團隊梳理與排除數據平台運作中產生的各種突發程式狀況，並完成記錄與建檔，隨著漸漸上手，您應可獨立開發 ETL、分析模型、運營腳本等功能之設計與上線。在工作過程中，您會與工程團隊、設計團隊、產品團隊溝通協作，完成規劃之項目與習慣自主進度掌控，偶而需配合完成合作廠商之專案、例如資料串接、資料爬取、數據報告等較為短期之工作。

【我們希望你】

一定要對開發工作具有熱情與自我學習不斷精進的渴望，遇到問題時，能獨立查找與判斷解決方案的可行性，若遇到無法解決的問題，也懂得如何清楚論途與提問，樂於與同仁們分享技術新知、提升自我能力，當挑戰尚不熟悉的工作內容時，充滿戰鬥力。



【職務需求】

需熟悉 Python 語法與 Django Framework
熟悉 PostgreSQL
能撰寫簡易 JavaScript
熟悉基礎網路架構、能理解負載平衡、DB 讀寫分離等概念
熟悉 Git (Git Flow) 版本控制 (我們使用 github)
熟悉 API 、MVC/MVT、前後端分離等相關概念
熟悉 Mac 開發環境
major: 資訊工程相關 資訊管理相關
skill: 系統架構規劃, 軟體程式設計, 網路程式設計, 資料庫程式設計

【加分項】

1. 聽過或玩過 Kafka、ClickHouse、Docker、Rust

cust_name: 台灣先藝科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
【English resume is required】

Position
As an engineer at ASM, you’ll have the opportunities to get involved in a wider scope of work compared to our larger competitors. While the workload is challenging, you are given the independence and autonomy to perform at your peak. This work requires thinking “outside of the box” in an innovative manner, so you must have the ability to collaborate with others to deliver creative solutions, work well under pressure and pay great attention to small details. 

Software Engineer
You will part of a team which is developing the next generation software for machine control combining the latest design principles, robotics, machine learning, big data, UI design and algorithms. You will be stationed in Taiwan Tainan and closely interacting with the team in Phoenix, USA. Travel to USA for training and team building is required. You must be customer focused with a penchant for quality.

Responsibilities
•	Design, develop, test, deploy, maintain and improve software.
•	Manage individual project priorities, deadlines and deliverables.
•	Specify specifications of each development and create engineering documents.
•	Evaluate designed/developed software with simulator and the actual tool.
•	Update and upgrade software and examine operations at customers’ sites.
•	Investigate faults, defects and bugs that happened at customers’ sites or
manufacturing site, and consider fixing and improving the functions.
•	Consider specifications that requested from customers, and propose to the customer.
•	Consider introducing new engineering or technology to tools and claim for intelligence property.

Qualifications:
•	BS or above degree in Computer Science, similar technical field of study.

job_name: 系統分析師(工作地點台北或高雄均可)
cust_name: 倍力資訊股份有限公司
job_detail:
【公司簡介】
倍力資訊股份有限公司（M-Power Information Co., Ltd.），創立於1999年8月，是一家穩健、踏實、又成長快速的資訊軟體整合服務公司。代理國內外先進的軟體解決方案，以一次購足（One-StopShopping）的概念，提供資訊系統開發所需的一切完整軟體方案與技術Know-How。

倍力資訊秉持著「精耕科技‧專業服務」的承諾與責任，以客戶的需求為優先，替客戶提供全方位的資訊軟體整合服務。在資訊軟體領域上提供專業技術，協助各產業中的IT資訊技術團隊提昇自我競爭力，穩定地完成各種資訊系統的應用與建置，進一步提升商業效率及企業利潤。

國內已有近200家上市/櫃集團企業採用本公司所自行研發之財務會計軟體。

【工作內容】
- 企業相關商業邏輯學習
- 產品需求及可行性分析
- 系統分析及規格設計
- 系統設計

【人員條件】
- 具備系統分析及規格撰寫、ER設計、Stored Procedure撰寫及溝通技巧。
- 具備系統分析經驗3年以上。 
- 有終身學習的習慣。 

【吸引加入至倍力團隊的原因】
- 可學習實務上嚴謹的產品開發方法
- 可參與軟體產品開發過程並給予意見，而並不只是擔任follow up的工作
- 注重工作生活平衡，正常工時不加班
- 風氣開放，可自由提出對團隊、產品或流程等多面向的優化建議

We are looking for a well-rounded and driven individual with a strong background in Computer Science. The ideal candidate would be strong C/C++ programmer with familiarity in Linux/UNIX. A candidate with interest in computational sciences and well-grounded in systems level disciplines would be preferred.

cust_name: 荷蘭商臺灣戴爾股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_detail:
Dell provides the technology that transforms the way we all work and live. But we are more than a technology company — we are a people company. We inspire, challenge and respect every one of our over 100,000 employees. We also provide them with unparalleled growth and development opportunities. We can’t wait for you to discover this for yourself as a Software Senior Principal Engineer on our VxRail team in Taipei.

The Software Engineering team delivers next-generation software application enhancements and new products for a changing world. Working at the cutting edge, we design and develop software for platforms, peripherals, applications and diagnostics — all with the most advanced technologies, tools, software engineering methodologies and the collaboration of internal and external partners.

What You'll Achieve
As a Software Senior Principal Engineer, you will be working on World Top1 HCI (Hyper Converged Infrastructure) product VxRail. You are going to work with cutting-edge technologies such as micro service, virtualization/container, edge computing, cloud based management etc. And you will build up good business sense to understand and define the next generation HCI product together with global talents, and to win together with our customers.

You Will
．Contribute to the design and architecture of high-quality, complex systems and software/HCI environments
．Prepare, review and evaluate software/HCI specifications for products and systems
．Contribute to the development and implementation of test strategies for complex software products and systems/for HCI products and systems
．Investigate/analyze new hardware technologies and the impacts to HCI software to support them.
skill: 軟體工程系統開發, 軟體程式設計, 資料庫程式設計, 資料庫軟體應用
other:
Essential Requirements
．BA/BS degree in Computer Science / Electrical Engineering or a related technical field or equivalent 12+ years of experience as a software developer
．Solid coding experience with Python/Java/Golang on Unix/Linux/BSD operating systems
．Solid understanding server hardware, such as  block diagram, components, storage subsystem, network subsystem. Understand the hardware impact to system software and application software.
．Experience developing within large scale distributed systems is a plus

Desirable Requirements
．PC/Server Industry standard such as PCIe, USB, BMC, IPMI, UEFI, SCSI, SATA, NVMe, SSD, HDD, RAID, containerized orchestration systems (Kubernetes, Rancher, etc), virtualization technologies like VMware
．Experience with network, storage, security product development

job_name: 高級產品設計師 Senior Game Designer VR/MR
cust_name: 肯狄科研有限公司
job_detail:
MAI打造VR版的人體Google Maps。透過調研、構思可行性方案到產品迭代開發，您將與設計、醫學內容、工程部門共同協作開發新的功能，或改善既有的產品體驗，以符合最佳的使用者體驗。您須有良好的溝通協調能力，理解並平衡客戶需求與技術限制，將團隊的想法與產品價值，給予引人注目的視覺體驗。
您將加入處於不同開發階段的項目，例如從快速原型設計到交付可擴展的設計元素，再到完善並優化 UI 元件以供最終版本測試，並與工程部門密切合作以交付高質量的產品輸出。 當您在製作令人驚艷的視覺體驗時，這個角色會需要注意細節、好奇心、適應性和聆聽他人意見，同時幫助團隊應對不同的技術挑戰。

***此職缺須具備中上的英文溝通與寫作能力，與國際團隊協作!

應徵資格
1.	7 年以上的 UI/UX 、視覺/動畫設計與軟體開發並導入銷售的實戰經驗。
2.	熟練使用 Adobe Creative Suite、Maya/3ds Max、Figma、Final Cut Pro 等工具。
3.	從視覺概念、wireframes、2D 和 3D 設計的協作開發和產品迭代的實戰經驗。
4.	具有跨平台與硬體的交互式應用體驗的設計經驗，例如：AR/VR、3D、Gaming、Education and Training。
5.	具有領導和指導團隊視覺設計與實踐的經驗。
6.	注重細節，為VR/Web/Tablet提供高質量的視覺體驗。
7.	具備與跨技術、業務或管理部門的討論中， 清晰大膽地表達並捍衛其產品設計與用戶體驗的核心價值。
8.	(加分) 具備Unreal Engine 或 Unity 開發經驗
9.	(加分) 具備歐美品牌設計經驗
major: 資訊工程相關 藝術學科類

job_name: 深度學習演算法工程師
cust_name: 英屬開曼群島商意騰科技股份有限公司台灣分公司
job_detail:
「伴科技走入日常，使生活便利而美好」是意騰科技的願景，為此我們將為各式各樣的裝置訂製演算法 ── 從低計算資源的晶片，到運算能力相對強悍的個人電腦，有了意騰科技的輔助，機器也能溫柔地善解人意。

現階段的發展方針以語音為主，當前的主要工作內容包含:

- 改良既有語音產品

不論是調整現有演算法，或提出嶄新的系統取代之，只要能在硬體規格限制下 讓使用情境更加地完善，我們樂於見到不同的想法。於流通產品上的改善將直接呈現於大眾眼前，也許能有一定的成就感。

- 從頭開發語音演算法

我們須為來自各方的需求快速地打造演算法，評估與驗證其可行性，並將具有前景的演算法進一步化為產品。

- 發想需求

為尚未有明確需求的新興文化發想使用情境，打造展示性質的演算法及系統，由開發人員向外推銷點子。

- 部署演算法至指定平台

公司有專業的同事幫忙將演算法實作於指定平台，然雙方可能就硬體限制或實作複雜度等來回溝通數次，調整演算法。

- 處理機器學習資料

在某些實驗中，我們會需要花時間處理資料。期待未來有機會能一同規劃，導入新流程、工具與思維，讓開發更加順利。

「深度學習」在上述演算法中扮演要角，也因此會有相當比例的工時與深度學習相關。

我們歡迎想從影像，自然語言處理或機器人等領域轉換跑道的大家，只要對深度學習有相當程度的掌握，歡迎投遞履歷，但起步時可能須多花些時間了解語音相關知識。

履歷可附上 GitHub 個人頁面，專題計畫，side projects 等。如果沒有前述內容也沒關係，大家投注心力的方向可能是學業，論文等等，這些經歷也都會是能讓自己脫穎而出的證明。期待能透過履歷認識特別的你/妳/ㄋ一ˇ。

面試包含至少兩階段 (不同日期)，第一階段將就工作內容做討論，核薪則於第二階段進行。
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /精通、寫 /中等, 中文:聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通
other:
必要項目:

- 溫柔，善解人意，行有餘力下樂於助人。
- 熟悉 Python: 近半年持續以 Python 作為主要開發語言之一，並不排斥以 Python 作為未來工作時主要使用的程式語言。
- 對 C/C++ 不陌生: 有超過半年時間以 C/C++ 做為主要開發語言。部署演算法的過程可能會碰到 C/C++。
- 熟悉深度學習: 有超過半年時間沉浸於深度學習中，對深度學習演算法做調整、研讀相關學術論文，並改良系統。
- 熟悉 PyTorch 或 TensorFlow。

加分項目:

- 具語音，聲音訊號處理背景知識。
- 具影像/影片處理經驗。
- 對 Git 不陌生。
- 對 CMake 不陌生。
- 了解多種機器學習演算法: 深度學習可能不是問題的唯一解或較佳解，我們可能碰到需要其他演算法或點子幫忙的情境。然而演算法的種類相當多，久未操作 (或從未實際操作) 可能忘記部分的內容，也許在需要它們時能快速的回顧即可。

cust_name: 新加坡商凱捷管理顧問股份有限公司台灣分公司_Capgemini Asia Pacific Pte. Ltd., Taiwan Branch
job_detail:
The business analyst is responsible for analyzing and modeling existing business processes. The goal of business process analysis is to understand and document current business procedures and identify areas for improvement. A thorough understanding of the current state of the organization is necessary prior to recommending changes related to implementing a new business solution. The business analyst uses modeling tools to document the current state of business processes as well as the desired future state. The business analyst is responsible for the knowledge transfer of business implications to the application/database developers and project managers.

Key Accountabilities :

• Business Requirements finalization and defining the scope of the project
• Solution Design: Propose solutions based on business requirements and work with Developers/Testers to implement the solution
• Support the team during the Unit Testing, SIT and UAT
• Quality Management: Ensures that all tasks carried out comply with procedures, mandatory quality standards and agreed testing standards and strategy
Supervisory responsibilities: 


Job Duties & responsibilities :

• Performs feasibility analysis, scope identification for projects, and works with the project management team to prioritizes deliverables, and negotiate on product functionalities.
• Extract the AS-IS processes from the business users and work the business requirements with the customer business users
• Analyse the AS-IS Scenarios and design the TO-BE business process flow with the Solution Architect
• Working with Solution Architect during the design and blueprinting phases
• Working with the business team for business use case development
• Review the details of Business Requirement Document (BRD) and translate it into functional specifications.
• Provides analytic support by coordinating data extraction from various databases and data interpretation.
• Ensure that right practices are being followed while documenting requirements, by putting governance in place across different business domains. Review the requirement documents generated by team and suggest changes required if any.
• Partners with development and analytic teams to provide reporting on software solutions.
• Participates in Integration Testing and User Acceptance Testing (UAT) and Functionality Testing.

Required Experience: 

• At least 2-3 years working experience in digital banking domain
• Strong analytical and logical reasoning skills.
• Familiarity with key core banking technologies
• Experience with SQL, Webservices, Sharepoint, Jira and Confluence
• Candidate with operational experience and technical background, will have an advantage.
• Excellent communication skills (written and verbal)

cust_name: Vyond_香港商高創動訊有限公司台灣分公司
job_detail:
Data Analyst (Product)

At Vyond, our mission is to put the power of video in the hands of everyone. Vyond allows people of all skill levels in all industries and job roles to create dynamic and powerful media. With features that go beyond moving text and images, you can build character-driven stories or compelling data visualizations that engage audiences and deliver results.

Founded as GoAnimate in 2007, Vyond has helped Global 2000 organizations, small businesses, and individuals produce more than 30 million videos.

With offices in Silicon Valley, Hong Kong, and Taiwan, Vyond employs a team of people whose creativity extends well beyond our office walls. We are passionate about the power of video and how it makes the static dynamic and transforms the mundane into the captivating.

© 2022 GoAnimate, Inc. All Rights Reserved. VYOND™ is a trademark of GoAnimate, Inc., registered in Argentina, Australia, Brazil, Canada, Chile, Egypt, the European Union, Hong Kong, India, Indonesia, Israel, Japan, Malaysia, Mexico, New Zealand, Norway, OAPI, the Philippines, Russia, Singapore, Switzerland, the United Kingdom, and Vietnam; Reg. U.S. Pat. & Tm. Off. Other names and marks are the property of their respective holders.

Position Overview

Data Analyst (Product) assists Data Scientist in product research, development and monitoring product data quality. The right candidate will have a passion for discovering insights hidden in large data sets and actively working with stakeholders to improve business outcomes. The role will also have an opportunity to develop Data Science and Customer Insights skills.

Responsibilities

- Participate in the sprint planning sessions conducted using agile methodology.
Assist in prioritization of new product features and evaluating their success after launch.
- Review tracking specifications and perform QA tests once they are implemented.
- Monitor key product and customer metrics for business impacting anomalies.
- Support business stakeholders by serving ad hoc data requests and analyses.
- Develop and apply good business sense to identify commercially impactful insights.

Requirements
- Bachelor degree or above in Computer Science, or equivalent.
- Minimum of 2 years’ experience in software development and data analysis.
- Hands-on working knowledge of relational database management systems, such as SQL Server, Oracle, or MySQL is required.
- Foundational knowledge in statistics and A/B testing.  
- Attention to detail, able to work independently and learn on-the-fly.
- Good interpersonal and communication skills.
- Enthusiasm and curiosity.
- Fluent English is a must.
major: 數學及電算機科學學科類

job_detail:
The Finance Project Specialist is responsible for local implementation of our Finance Transformation roadmap, including synergy/integrate different data sources to enhance data accessibility and availability, support 2nd phase of performance monitoring platform. He/she is responsible for co-designing with key stakeholders local functionalities, mapping local requirements for seamless data flows into the new tool and upskilling our Finance team. The role also includes design and implementation of locally relevant dashboards to empower our sales and marketing teams. 

Data governance, data automation, data integration
•	Create and maintain documentation of E2E (e.g. inventory to offtake) mapping and deep understanding of data flows and data ownership 
•	Develop automation and digital solutions (e.g. RPA/VBA) to streamline process
•	Define and implement technical and procedural mechanisms for checking and ensuring data quality and consistency

Finance transformation – performance monitoring dashboards
•	Analyze (financial and non-financial) data, interpret patterns, and trends with the purpose of generating insights and actionable recommendations
•	Work closely with Sales and Marketing to assess business needs requiring enriched financial data
•	Design and enhance key performance dashboards to support Sales and Marketing teams to achieve targets
•	Design KPIs that automatically flags key Risks and Opportunities to drive a more proactive and influencing FP&A approach
•	Work on simplifying and enhancing current PAF workflow (dashboard with KPIs automatically flagging if any concerns etc.)

Develop and build data orchestration workflow to enable an accessible data platform
•	Build and maintain scalable data pipelines from a wide range of datasources to fulfill business needs
•	Design best practice framework to assess code quality, testing and continuous improvements of data pipelines
•	Work with and leverage resources from regional data architecture team to contribute to PR Taiwan transformation projects

● 相關本科系畢業
● 最低大學學歷

cust_name: 方客特股份有限公司
job_detail:
<我們僅接受使用以下連結應徵 />

https://forms.gle/TuUpb1PKvXggM1YP6 



<關於 Fontech />

我們是一家軟體開發公司，「坐而言不如起而行」是我們創辦的座右銘，希望任何專案在開發到執行的過程都能如規畫一般，好的使用者體驗、質感優美的介面，以及符合品質的效能。近兩年來，在團隊的努力和客戶的熱情介紹下，很幸運能夠服務更多元的客戶。為了提供更好的服務，使客戶享有更優質的軟體，我們需要對於軟體開發有著無比熱忱和夢想的你加入我們，希望我們能一起創造下一個事業巔峰，成為下一個台灣之光。



<能力要求 />

不怕狗
對技術有愛與熱情，自我要求高，注重程式碼品質
喜愛思考，樂於探索問題的本質並解決問題
能清晰表達自己的想法，並保持開放的態度，接受他人想法
具備獨力思考的能力，能清楚知道自己在做什麼，及為什麼這麼做
熟悉 Git 版本控制工具
熟悉 Laravel 框架



<加分條件 />

熱愛參加社群相關活動
熟悉 Design Pattern
熟悉 Linux 系統操作
前後分離網站開發經驗
DevOps 經驗
Open Source 專案維護經驗



<工作內容 />

與 Fontech 團隊合作，打造高水準、高品質的網站
維護既有專案
參與 GitFlow 及 Code Review 等開發流程
參與每週一次的 Fontech 團隊週會、部門讀書會、部門週議
使用 Laravel + Lighthouse 撰寫 GraphQL API，供前端伙伴串接



<技術團隊文化 />

保持開放的態度 - 面對不同的想法及建議，成員間保持開放的態度，互相討論切磋及進步
注重程式碼品質 - 我們不只有 Code Review，成員也以撰寫出簡潔、優美、易讀、好維護的程式碼為目標，成為程式碼的藝術師
勇於嘗試新技術 - 成員們勇於嘗試各種新事物，保有對技術的愛與熱情，擁抱改變、持續學習，並推動各種新技術、流程或架構，幫助團隊能更順暢、舒服及迅速地開發
工程師是懶惰的 - 我們擁有各式各樣的自動化流程（例如自動測試及部署），以及使用 GraphQL，大大減少 API 文件撰寫的負擔
解決問題的專家 - 成員間會互相討論，一同解決問題，嘗試找出最適合當下的解決方案，而並非只是完成需求
成員間知識共享 - 我們每週有讀書會，並採用分享及討論的型式，讓成員可以學習及分享彼此的知識



<我們目前主要使用技術及工具 />

Backend: PHP, Laravel, Node.js, Socket.io
Frontend: Vue.js, Nuxt.js, React, Next.js
Database: MySQL, Redis
Mobile: React Native
DevOps: Docker, Drone CI, Forge, Ansible, Kubernetes
Tools: Slack, GitHub, Asana

cust_name: 2ndSTREET_台灣極沃股份有限公司
job_detail:
(限時)2ndSTREET(台灣極沃)管理部-系統設備/網路/軟體人員

【MISSION】充分利用先進工具把内部管理體質更優化

【VALUE】4C
・Customer-centric(顧客中心): 無論店鋪本社, 提升作業效率抽出更多時間獻給顧客(思想)
・Change(變化): 創造嶄新直覺的工作環境, 改變每位同仁既有思維, 提升EX(員工體驗)
・Challenge(挑戰): 失敗是成功的捷徑, 大膽創新各管理層解決方案, 使成本再降低
・Communication(情報透明性): 活用Slack/GWs等, 店鋪⇆本社之人事物, 無縫接軌

【主要業務】從事店鋪/本社, 新展店/即存店, 各方面系統設備/網路/軟體全方面相關事由

【主要業務細項舉例】
1. (通)負責通信設備（如：電腦系統、數位通信線）架設與管理維護。
2. (通)負責設備諮詢、設定、維護、問題解決等技術工作。
3. (資)負責向日本系統單位聯絡安排現有系統之修改與擴充等工作。
4. (資)依設備/系統/軟體建立簡單操作手冊。
5. (資)分配與設計記憶儲存空間，並維護資料庫和系統安全。
6. (資)負責制訂各種系統/軟體作業之簡單標準程序。
7. (資)負責電腦設備維護、機房作業管理、電腦使用者管理等工作。
8. (網)設定、檢修網路設備。
9. (網)監控系統運作，並建立危機處理的標準流程。
10. (網)分析、解決用戶端通訊問題。
11. (網)設定電腦周邊硬體系統的網絡連線（如：印表機）。
12. (網)提供用戶端人員網路系統操作的教育訓練。
13. (它)與現有供應商聯絡。
14. (它)透過比較分析開發新相關供應商。
15. (它)其他主管交代的事情。

【次要業務細項舉例】
1. (資)收集電腦作業所需輸入之資料，並分送輸出資訊給相關單位，同時進行使用者操作訓練。
2. (網)規劃網路管理機制。
3. (網)控管、備份網路伺服器內的檔案，並設定用戶端權限，以確保檔案安全。
4. (網)負責資訊安全的管制。
5. (網)依照企業需求，規劃、架設及管理各種伺服器。
6. (程)Slack,GoogleWorkspace等應用

3. 面談時會與您進一步溝通專案內容，選擇最終技術職位。

您會加入團隊進行各式專案開發，包括但不限於【金融 (銀行/保險/證券)、航空、物流、資料整合、新創服務】等產業的中大型專案需求，例如：

【我們期望您擁有的特質】
- 人際溝通能力：必須能夠與不同工作職務和不同特質的人相處融洽、與團隊合作無間
- 高度團隊意識：願意以團隊目標為優先，同時也尊重團隊夥伴有不同的意見

【我們希望您具備的技能】
- 2~5年以上，已具備個人主力語言開發實務經驗尤佳

【注意事項】
履歷初步符合需求者，我們將於一週內與您聯繫。
誠摯感謝您投遞履歷。

cust_name: 美商賽發馥股份有限公司臺灣分公司
job_detail:
SiFive is an idea-to-silicon company founded by the inventors of RISC-V to simplify the design and production of custom SoCs.

As the leading commercial provider of RISC-V processor IP, SiFive is on a mission to help engineers design custom chips for domain-specific solutions for many markets, including 5G, edge AI, enterprise networking, storage, and consumer devices.

Industry-leading innovators, including six of the top ten semiconductor companies, are working with SiFive thanks to our proven success, deep expertise, and rich partner ecosystem. With SiFive’s rich IP ecosystem and accessible design platform, every market has access to the development of workload-focused hardware needed to design next-generation products.

SiFive is proud to take a software-first approach to develop tools and frameworks that achieve cutting-edge performance without compromising quality. SiFive's Intelligence processors leverage and extend RISC-V Vectors to accelerate AI applications for the edge and beyond. Our Core IPs navigate tradeoffs between performance, power, and area, but do not sacrifice flexibility or programmability. Our software stack is co-designed with the hardware and developed with scalability and quality in mind. Join us to create revolutionary software from the ground up. 

As a System Software Engineer, you will work with system architecture and hardware engineering teams to help design and evaluate systems, including CPUs, interconnects, firewalls, and related IP blocks.  You’ll work with our software group to design software implementations that take advantage of hardware features and integrate cleanly with existing operating systems, such as Linux. You’ll write software for Linux kernel, device drivers, OpenSBI, u-boot, Yocto/OpenEmbedded. You’ll be a part of creating something big, all based around the RISC-V instruction set architecture.

Responsibilities:
	
As a System Software Engineer, you will work with system architecture and hardware engineering teams to help design and evaluate systems, including CPUs, interconnects, firewalls, and related IP blocks. You’ll work with our software group to design software implementations that take advantage of hardware features and integrate cleanly with existing operating systems, such as Linux. You’ll write software for Linux kernel, device drivers, OpenSBI, u-boot, Yocto/OpenEmbedded. You’ll be a part of creating something big, all based around the RISC-V instruction set architecture.


Responsibilities:
-Design, develop, upstream and release system software: Linux kernel, device drivers, OpenSBI, u-boot, Yocto/OpenEmbedded (both SiFive-proprietary and public open source)
-Engage with architecture, hardware engineering, and other software engineering teams to review, and refine features

Job Description

He/she will take the lead to plan and execute the APAC projects, which are related to Cyber security, cloud based DBaaS, SaaS, IaaS, CaaS, PaaS.
You'll work in a stable yet innovative environment which requires frequent cross-region communications with different parties - external partners/vendors and internal Project team members.
To be a successful candidate, you will need to have proven experience in project management and the ability to lead project teams of various sizes. A Project Management Professional (PMP) certification or Prince2 Practitioner Certification is a huge advantage.

As a Project Manager, your typical day might include the following:  

- Coordinate regional project management activities, resources, equipment and information
- Develop project schedule and keep track on the progress
- Break projects into doable actions and set timeframes
- Lead regular project meetings and document key action points
- Identify any risks of project delay and provide solutions for on-time project delivery
- Manage change request raised by business units
- Drive and manage the development & implementation of major projects, thus attain the desired business results
- Monitor the operation of the projects after launch, for optimal risk and crisis management
- Collaborate with internal and external stakeholders to achieve target project result

This job might be for you if you are :

- Degree or above in IT related disciplines
- Minimum 5 years of IT experience with at least 2 years in project leader or coordination role
- Either holder of PMI PMP or PRINCE2 certification
- Holder of PMI Agile Certified Practitioner or Scrum Master Certified is an advantage
- Technical proficiency in hardware and system software, as well as experience implementing application software / packages and working with vendors
- Proven experience in managing projects with ability to multitask
- Knowledge of the following disciplines: project and program delivery, change management, application development management / infrastructure development management and vendor management
- Understand operations, development and implement in Cloud and Enterprise
Solutions with relevant project experience. Able to manage projects by applying suitable methodologies to facilitate the implementation of projects
- A capable team player, be innovative with proficient organizing & execution abilities
- Excellent communication and presentation skills with good command of English and Chinese in both spoken and written. 
- Proficient Cantonese listening skill is an advantage.

Your Future Work Life?

- Flexible Working Practices
- Work in a Cozy and Google-like working environment with open seating, breakout, game, gym areas and free coffee
- Dress Casual and Smart everyday
- Attractive package and/or OKR (objective-key-result) bonus
- Birthday leave

job_detail:
【部門簡介】
公司新事業部門在2022年初建立純軟團隊，
現擴編的這位前端工程師，將會負責純軟軟體的開發，
團隊目標是開拓顯示器的更多可能，並採跨部門合作延伸專案價值。

團隊開發產品為因應視訊會議而生的數位白板，
2022年6月參加美國Las Vegas Infocomm展覽，
並於Amazon推出第一代Meetboard，蒐集市場反饋，
為加速產品的開發，我們目前需求針對純軟產品開發，
以及經營純軟品牌有興趣的工程師。

公司每週會有一天可在家上班，根據所屬業務不同天數也能調整，
每個月部門會有一本選書，讓你在閒暇之餘也能夠看看不同產業鏈的書籍。

【工作項目】
1.     配合團隊進行版控，使用git
2.     負責軟體分析、維護、開發與設計
3.     前端效能優化
4.     開發共用元件
5.     與團隊成員溝通，釐清與了解需求，規劃解決方案

【必備技能】
1.     具備串接後端API經驗
2.     熟悉vue.js 框架，並具開發經驗
3.     熟悉HTML5、CSS3、JavaScript ES6
4.     具備獨立開發之能力
5.     了解RESTFul API觀念及有串接經驗
6.     熟悉基本前端開發工具如Node.js Yarn Npm等

【部門精神】
1.     永遠期許明天的自己能夠衝撞今天的自己
2.     對待部門內的所有人都像朋友一樣但必須保有尊重
3.     習慣性分享新知，無論這會不會賦予現在的你意義
4.     這永遠不會是最後一條，一起為這個部門灌注更多精神吧

job_name: 技術客服 (無經驗可) Technical Customer Service
cust_name: 六書堂數位學習股份有限公司
job_detail:
About the role..

1. 解決顧客問題、問題收集與追蹤回覆、優化流程。
2. 產品基本操作測試及問題回報。
3. 提供產品相關資訊及申辦資料流程協助。
4. 良好的溝通能力和跨部門溝通協調能力，有團隊合作精神。
5. 搜集顧客意見並反饋，提升顧客服務滿意度。
6. 每日更新平台、客戶與廠商所反應的問題。
7. 處理主管交辦事項。


What do you possess..

▶️有技術相關經驗或背景優先考慮，排除基礎技術問題。
▶️口條清晰，邏輯清楚。
▶️熟悉客服作業流程及常用的通訊軟體。
▶️熟悉文書作業(Ｗord,Excel)以及電腦操作知識，打字速度 75~100 字/分鐘。
▶️對問題處理與反饋有較高的熱情。
▶️具備較強的學習能力和優秀的溝通能力。
▶️具備良好的應變能力和承壓能力。
▶️有敏銳的市場洞察力，有強烈的事業心、責任心和積極工作態度，有相關工作經驗者優先。
language: 英文:聽 /中等、說 /中等、讀 /中等、寫 /中等
specialty: Apple, Mac OS, Android, iOS, Windows 10
skill: 客戶情報蒐集, 客訴案件處理, 作業系統基本操作, 電腦設備裝配, 資訊設備操作檢修, 資訊設備環境設定, 功能測試(function test), 使用者測試(Usability test), 問題追蹤處理(Bug tracking), 文書處理軟體操作

job_name: 平台運維工程師 / 運維主管 (DevOps Lead Engineer)
cust_name: 台灣賀思達科技有限公司
job_detail:
公司介紹

STACS (Hashstacs Pte Ltd) 是一家總部位於新加坡的金融科技公司並且致力於環境、社會和治理金融科技（ESGFinance）。新加坡金融管理局 (MAS)指定STACS為 合作夥伴, 開創ESGpedia項目。這項目提供ESG綠化數據，通過資產和證書數位化科技引領前進 。

STACS 為 ESG 金融提供數個行業的 ESG 數據和平臺。該平臺也提供專業的碳排放量數據抵消系統以減少行業的碳排放量。 我們的客戶與合作夥伴包括全球投資銀行、國家證券交易所、託管銀行、資產管理公司和私人銀行。此外STACS 是新加坡金融管理局頒發的 2020 年全球金融科技創新挑戰賽的兩次獲獎企業。

職務說明

STACS是一家發展迅速的金融科技公司，我們正在尋找一位平台運維工程師加入我們這迅速擴張的工程團隊，為下一代基於雲的金融技術平台與區塊鏈做出貢獻。

理想的候選人需要對DevOps 程式非常感興趣，必須擁有一門技術的專長，例如Kubernetes 和 Java。您必須擁有資深技術專長，確保雲端的順利部署，也同時對自動化運維 (CI/CD)解決方案感興趣。
候選人也必須能在敏捷與高速的工作發展環境中擁有獨立、敏銳思考。並對同僚保持良好的溝通，直至完成工作方案

您將成為改變當今資本市場運作方式的關鍵貢獻者。若成功的加入STACS這個大家庭，您將與團隊共同為客戶構建出最佳平台及產品。

工作職責

作為平台運維工程師，您將負責根據生產環境中的業務要求構建平台新功能並增強現有功能。
您會設計和構建金融行業中具變革性和授權性的核心功能。

您的日常職責涵蓋以下內容：
•	負責公司產品的技術維運工作, 保障產品整體高效能高可用狀態。
•	跟進產品服務從接入到上線，負責自動化運維CI/CD之解決方案。
•	開發運維工具，對接平台接口，參與平台工具腳本的編寫。  
•	具有大型網站服務之高可用性架構規劃、建置、維護經驗者佳
•	解決運營中遇到的技術問題，提早發現運營之風險破口，優化業務流程。 
•	透過應用技術與開發能力提升維運工作效率和優化服務質量。
o	改善自動化版本控管流程。 
o	自動化布署設計。
•	設置和管理日誌和配置工具。
•	注重DevOps核心精神，建立良好的跨團隊合作模式，透過溝通建立信任關係。 協助各相關部門，根據狀況及需求完善處理事件。



Company Description

STACS (Hashstacs Pte Ltd) is a Singapore-headquartered FinTech company focused on ESG FinTech, in partnership with the Monetary Authority of Singapore’s (MAS) Project Greenprint for ESGpedia which powers the Greenprint ESG Registry. STACS serves as the Nexus of ESG Finance with ESG data across multiple industries and digital tools for the financial sector to scale decarbonisation financing, as well as a platform to provide high-quality carbon offsets to mitigate residual emissions. Its clients and partners include global financial institutions and corporates.

STACS is an Award Winner of the MAS Global FinTech Innovation Challenge Awards 2020, and a two-time awardee of the Financial Sector Technology and Innovation (FSTI) Proof of Concept (POC) grant, under the Financial Sector Development Fund administered by the MAS. 

Job Summary

We are looking for a DevOps Lead Engineer specializing in Kubernetes and AWS Cloud to join our rapidly expanding Engineering team and contribute to the reliability, scalability, and security of our product platforms. You will have the opportunity to work on the forefront of technology that includes private blockchain networks and containerized applications running natively on the cloud. 
The ideal candidate is a hands-on engineer with a strong interest in implementing DevOps procedures to ensure the smooth deployment of software on AWS Cloud using the latest technologies. You must have strong, first-hand technical expertise with Kubernetes and Java applications with a passion for automation. You must be comfortable managing an international team of engineers and working in a fast-paced environment with little supervision in an Agile environment.
You will be a key contributor in the burgeoning field of sustainable finance working in cross discipline teams ranging from Customer Success to the Product team. 

Job Responsibilities

As a DevOps Lead Engineer, you will be responsible for designing and implementing automated deployment solutions and monitoring tools and managing a small team of engineers.  

Your core responsibilities: 
•	Manage a team of devops engineers to ensure the platform is resilient, high performing and scalable
•	Design and deploy automation tools, monitoring, logging, configuration, service discovery required for the product platform
•	Improve/redesign the current deployment stack with the best tools for ensuring security, high availability, and resiliency
•	Orchestrate the deployment process with Kubernetes and work with containers (Java)
•	Create CI/CD Pipelines
•	Develop scripts to automate work processes
•	Setup and manage log and configuration tools

要求条件

•	工程學或相關領域的學士學位或更高學位
•	至少擁有 6 年的運維經驗 (例如Docker, Kubernetes, etc)
•	設定和執行 CI/CD 平台的專業知識 (例如Jenkins etc)
•	擁有Configuration Management Tool 經驗 (例如Ansible, Puppet etc)
•	擁有日誌管理經驗(例如Prometheus)
•	擁有腳本知識 (Bash)
•	使用過Tomcat、Weblogic類似的系統，也包含Java 的應用程式
•	擁有1 個或更多雲平台的經驗（AWS 是一個優勢, Azure）
•	瞭解網路協定（Sockets、HTTP、TCP/IP）

該候選人必須:

•	重視團隊合作。
•	有好奇心和積極的學習態度。
•	喜歡編程與代碼。
•	適應能力與獨立解決問題能力
•	以客戶為中心
•	具有主動性，能在複雜性和獨立性上茁壯成長


Requirements

•	B.S. or M.S. in Computer Science or equivalent degree or experience
•	At least 6 years of relevant experience as a DevOps engineer
•	Highly experienced with container and orchestration technologies (Docker, Kubernetes)
•	Production experience working with AWS Cloud
•	Expertise in configuring and running a CI/CD platform (Jenkins, etc)
•	Experienced in configuration management tools (Ansible, Puppet, etc)
•	Experienced in log management tools (Prometheus, etc)
•	Experience scaling and automating secure infrastructure with no single point of failure (Terraform, Cloud formation, etc)
•	Scripting Knowledge in Bash
•	Proficient in working with Middleware systems (Tomcat, Weblogic) and Java based applications
•	Understanding of networking protocols (sockets, HTTP, TCP/IP)


What you will need to thrive:
•	Value teamwork above all.
•	Natural curiosity to learn.
•	Loves to work with code.
•	Intrinsically motivated personality.
•	High adaptability and strong problem-solving skills.
•	Customer focused mindset.
•	Self-starter who thrives on complexity and independence.

cust_name: CYBAVO_博歐科技有限公司
job_detail:
Who we are
CYBAVO is a blockchain security solution provider that helps institutions secure digital assets. On the blockchain, where loss of data means real loss of value, organizations need a comprehensive solution to manage and protect the most crucial part of the puzzle– their private keys. This is exactly what CYBAVO offers: a platform that delivers advanced tools and features to help developers, crypto exchanges, or TradFi institutions harness the power of blockchain technology, and build on Web3 in a reliable, secure manner.


What you will be doing
- Work in a data platform to write complex SQL queries and build custom reports
- Create product usage/adoption reports and produce datasets for our internal teams
- Assist various functions (Sales, Marketing, Customer Service, Product, Compliance) when they need help finding answers to one-off questions or understanding in-product usage
- Use business intelligence tools like Data Studio or Tableau to build various dashboards for our internal teams to track metrics
- Good team working and communication skills, and be able to discuss with other team stakeholders to understand the business requirements to produce reports and dashboards.


What you should have
- At least two years of experience in a professional role as a Data Analyst who uses complex SQL queries to produce reports and analyses
- Ability to translate business requirements into non-technical terms
- Experience in a fast-moving startup environment in which an analyst serves and prioritizes data requests from multiple functions and stakeholders
- Familiar in using different visualization tools to present the story behind metrics
- An eye for detail and accuracy
- Have a passion for blockchain / cryptocurrencies


We also prefer but don’t require
- Have sense on different product business models and metrics
- Have sense on the technical terms in several fields, e.g. Finance, Sales, Marketing, and Products
Understanding of the crypto / blockchain technology and business

job_name: 【AI團隊】解決方案經理 Solution Manager_台北
cust_name: 昕力資訊股份有限公司
job_detail:
請至 https://tpisoftware.teamdoor.io/s/lOP44ub5 投遞履歷，這邊會優先審核喔！

我們昕力資訊是一家規模超過550+人的B2B跨國軟體設計與開發公司，主要提供企業軟體建置與顧問服務，專精於AI智能客服機器人、Fintech與數位銀行、行動壽險、行動App應用、大數據等系統解決方案，並擁有多項自有產品，經營據點跨足台北、新竹、台中、台南、高雄、新加坡及越南。

在現在這個數位轉型的大時代中，為了提供更專業的服務及產品，AI團隊需要優秀的夥伴加入。

【AI Solution Manager工作內容會包含什麼？】
1. 針對現有以及發展中之產品線，規劃符合市場與產業需求的解決方案。
2. 與產品銷售團隊合作，針對客戶的需求進行需求訪談並規劃解決方案，提供系統分析與技術諮詢，並在合適的時候協調內外部資源，協助專案或產品能順利發展與交付。
3. 定期對市場上的競品與技術趨勢分析、並對自有解決方案的深化與廣化進行調整。
4. 提案簡報製作，測試文件、流程規劃等相關文案撰寫。
5. 配合參與業務或行銷活動，以推廣AI產品/解決方案。

【我們希望您具備的技能】
1. 具備5年以上AI的專案經驗，對提供客戶AI技術說明及方案，解決相關議題與需求充滿熱忱。
2. 熟悉AI相關產業、生態及產品服務，對市場競品以及相關技術的發展狀況具備敏感度以及熱情。
3. 資訊或資管相關科系畢業尤佳。

【我們期望您擁有的特質】
- 人際溝通能力：必須能夠與不同工作職務和不同特質的人相處融洽、與團隊合作無間
- 高度團隊意識：願意以團隊目標為優先，同時也尊重團隊夥伴有不同的意見
- 邏輯思辨能力：能夠快速分析每個執行方案的優缺點、可行的替代方案
- 自主學習能力：積極主動學習相關產業的domain know-how及工作上所需技能

【注意事項】
如果團隊覺得有機會合作，想跟您更深入的交流，我們將會儘速與您聯繫
若不符合的面試者，將不另行通知，謝謝!
language: 中文:聽 /精通、說 /精通、讀 /精通、寫 /精通, 英文:聽 /精通、說 /中等、讀 /精通、寫 /精通
skill: 專案規劃執行╱範圍管理, 專案溝通╱整合管理, 提案與簡報技巧

job_name: Quality Assurance Engineer /（手動）QA測試工程師
cust_name: 天府互動科技有限公司
job_detail:
我們正在尋找充滿熱情、實現自我價值的你/妳!!

如果你覺得這不只是一份工作，更是信念的體現與自我成長，歡迎你/妳加入我們!
我們有著衝勁與活力的團隊，扁平化的組織架構，不管在技術增進或問題挑戰都能及時獲得討論與解決。我們也不斷精進並持續優化現有工作流程和提升職員的能力，讓我們自己的事業興盛發展。

我們關心員工的職涯發展與身心平衡， 如果你/妳願意接受挑戰， 你/妳有機會晉升到公司的任何一個位階。認同公司的目標並跟著我們一起朝著目標努力，在職涯上大躍進吧！


▋工作內容

依據公司需求進行軟體專案開發，具體內容據當前開發需求而定。目前主要為

・ Web應用程式開發


隨著進行的專案不同，需要的技能可能會有所不同，因此我們希望您對於學習不熟悉的技能與工具抱有熱情，也勇於嘗試不同的工作節奏與新的挑戰！

▋工作形式
・ 半小時彈性打卡制
・ 見紅休假（同人事行政總處行事曆）


▋其他事項
薪資將依據您具備的技能、個人學經歷及期望待遇綜合考量核薪（本薪＋伙食津貼）並與您協議。若您的技能遠超出此項職缺所需，我們很樂意與您討論更適合您的職位，並依據該職位薪資安排。

若您具備應徵條件所列以外之技能，也請條列於個人履歷上，我們很重視您的天賦能為我們帶來的貢獻！

▋必備技能：

・依據（分析）案件需求（網頁為主）建立測試計畫及測試案例
・執行 功能測試、整合測試及壓力測試
・依據測試結果撰寫測試報告（Bug 重現方法、潛在問題、初步調查）
・追蹤問題處理狀況
・分析、歸納測試結果，回饋於 Review Meeting

▋可選技能：

・對網頁類型案件的測試有相當的心得及見解
・了解 黑箱、白箱、灰箱 測試
・耐心、細心、謹慎，甚至喜歡挑戰「把網站玩壞」為樂
・具備良好邏輯能力
・重視團隊合作，樂意溝通與分享
・熟悉網頁類型案件中工程師常犯的錯誤


▋面試 / 錄取流程如下
1. 投遞您精心準備的履歷
2. 收到人資的面試邀約安排
3. 一面：人資＋單位主管（含試前技術測題）
4. 二面：技術主管＋高階主管
5. 恭喜錄取!! HR 小姐姐通知您


您可以在面談一、二階段和我們團隊的核心成員討論更多公司與工作的細節，並提出您對工作內容與薪資報酬等等的期待。


合適者人選我們將於7個工作天內主動聯繫您，不合適者不另行通知，若對此職抱有極大興趣歡迎不吝來信詢問進度或告知我們您的意願！！
skill: 功能測試(function test), 使用者測試(Usability test), 軟體整合測試, 測試計劃及測試報告書撰寫

2、與網頁設美編計師配合，將前端網頁和後端 API 串接及前端動態功能撰寫。 
3、擁有良好的溝通能力、邏輯思維能力、自我管理能力、團隊意識、高配合度、獨立作業能力。 

●基本條件 
1、熟悉 Golang、VueJs、HTML5、ECMAscript、SQL 語法。 
2、熟悉 Git 版本控制。 
3、熟悉 MariaDB 或 MySQL 操作。 

●加分條件 
1、一年以上資料庫網站開發經驗(Java、C#、PHP等)。 
2、熟悉 CSS 語法。 
3、熟悉 Linux 指令。 
4、有 Cordova Web APP、Websocket 開發經驗。 
5. 有 Message Queue (NSQ、Kafka等) 開發經驗。 
6、有後端排程程式開發經驗。 
7、熟悉物件導向設計、設計模式。 
8、注重程式碼品質，能進行程式重構。 
9、有優化程式執行效能及加強程式碼相關資訊安全相關經驗。
10. 有金流串接經驗 

※無 Golang、VueJS 開發經驗者，公司會提供教育訓練。

cust_name: 嘉利科技股份有限公司
job_detail:
你不必是資訊本科系的人。

只要對於異質系統整合和軟體開發工作有熱情，對於找出錯誤有智慧和耐心，對於自己寫作的軟體讓每天有上萬人次使用且穩定運作有自信，對於讓全台灣每天超過60%信用卡交易通過自己的系統處理有野心；

歡迎您加入台灣信用卡刷卡機業界第一名的嘉利科技。你的工作內容包括：

1. Android 應用軟體設計 - 和你想像中不一樣的Android軟體設計，需要軟硬兼具的知識與技能。

2. Android手機APP應用軟體撰寫 - 這才是你想像中的Andoid軟體，但是又多了金融交易的核心知識。

3. 線上/線下金融支付交易規劃與實作 - 真正硬派的，已經全球運作超過半世紀的信用卡金融交易知識。詐騙集團一定拿你沒輒。

4. 晶片卡/非接觸式卡/NFC交易處理系統設計 - 放諸四海、通行全球的統一處理規範。 

5. 信用卡/QRCode/電子票證等支付軟體設計 - 真正每天在第一線服務使用者的支付軟體。

若你己經是專家，歡迎你換個舞台。

若你沒有經驗，可以重新學習。

歡迎你的加入。

job_name: 數據分析專員　具備日文或英文溝通能力
cust_name: 台灣克羅瓦雷克斯股份有限公司
job_detail:
1. 以數據分析之專業人士為目標，活用數據資料為客戶解決營運上的各種問題。
2. 掌握數據結構與環境，從獲得數據到分析應用前的加工處理，及分析數據到製作分析報告之一連串作業流程。
3. 分析大型企業客戶端之現有數據，透過協助客戶成功行銷等實例，創造企業經營之價值。
例如根據客戶端的會員卡與會員情報，分析購買資料（ID-POS數據），以提高顧客消費金額或消費頻率之服務。
4. 使用的語言：R/Python/SQL(必要)。
5. CLTV機器學習：LGBM/XGBoost等交互學習，並通過CNN/RNN/GAN等深度學習建模
6. 數據挖掘：決策樹、關聯分析。
7. 數據庫：各種數據庫、DMP、CDP中的數據組合/提取/預處理。
8. 雲計算：使用 GCP/AWS/AZURE 進行數據分析/服務開發工作。
9. 精通日文或英文，善溝通協調者。

Duties & Responsibilities:
• Support the data analysis solutions team to solve operational issues for customers.  
• Create BI analysis reports, integrate organizational business, website, community, and consumer behavior data, and assist the team in interpreting the data to understand the scenario and make data-driven decisions.
• Analyze the data collected from major enterprise clients and provide them with effective marketing techniques to increase their business operations. Ensure effective communication with partners within your organization as well as external stakeholders.
For Example, Analyzing the purchase data (ID-POS data) to raise the customer's consumption amount or consumption frequency based on the membership card and membership information for the client.
• Manage client relationships, participate in strategic discussions, and suggest ways data analysis or a data science solution might advance the company's marketing and product development.
• Experience working with business and product owners to translate technical findings into simple findings and takeaways for a non-technical audience.

Qualifications :
• Candidates should have a bachelor's degree or higher, preferably in a quantitative field, and some relevant experience

Skills:
Technical Skills
1. Understanding of Data Science Languages : R/Python/SQL (Preferred)
2. Strong data visualization skills, proficiency in at least one tool (e.g., Power BI, Tableau, Qlik), and a willingness to learn more about data visualization
3. Skills and knowledge of statistics (AB testing, hypothesis testing, regression)
4. Knowledge of relational databases (MySQL, PostgreSQL) and Microsoft Excel.
5. Familiar with the use of machine learning and deep learning techniques and a willingness to learn more about it.
Data cleaning/crawling/data integration. - Develop and improve ETL processes
6. Knowledge of Cloud Computing: Use GCP/AWS/AZURE for data analysis/service development work
7. Knowledge of CLTV(Customer Lifetime Value) using Machine Learning.
8. Business English/Japanese is must for excellent communication skills

Experience :
• You must have at least 1-2 years of experience in data analysis.
• Must be independent, hardworking and analytical, with good communication skills, an adventurous spirit and a desire to learn new things

福利制度
•轉調制度：可申請外派至東京、沖繩或拉斯維加斯等集團下任一據點，提供有高度熱情或工作能力優良者實現活耀於世界舞台的機會。
•公司因應新型冠狀病毒，已積極導入彈性上下班與遠距工作等制度。
•新年假期或黃金周連休之取得機會。
•提高職場技能之社内跨部門兼職制度。
•職涯規劃檢討驗證制度。
•獎賞制度。
•業務績效佳、或是對公司發展有高貢獻度之人才，通過評估後可轉任儲備幹部或取得績效獎金。
•因應聯合國提出之SDGs永續發展目標理念所新創之茶園事業正在日本發展中。
•養生保健設施(日本國內＝沖縄市、南阿爾卑斯市、西丹澤(神奈川縣)）。

cust_name: 博彥科技有限公司
job_detail:
The System Analyst is responsible for analyzing and modeling existing system functions. The goal of function process analysis is to understand and document current business procedures and identify areas for improvement. A thorough understanding of the current state of the organization is necessary prior to recommending changes related to implementing a new business solution. The business analyst uses modeling tools to document the current state of business processes as well as the desired future state. The business analyst is responsible for the knowledge transfer of business implications to the application/database developers and project managers.

Key Accountabilities
•	Business Requirements finalization and defining the scope of the project.
•	Gap Analysis.
•	Solution Design: Propose solutions based on business requirements and work with Developers/Testers to implement the solution.
•	Support the team during the Unit Testing, SIT and UAT.
•	Quality Management: Ensures that all tasks carried out comply with procedures, mandatory quality standards and agreed testing standards and strategy.

Supervisory responsibilities: 
•	Work with a team of BA outside project work
•	Mentoring Junior BA within the team
•	Key clients (internal and external)

Job Duties & responsibilities 
•	Performs feasibility analysis, scope identification for projects, and works with the project management team to prioritizes deliverables, and negotiate on product functionalities.
•	Extract the AS-IS processes from the business users and work the business requirements with the customer business users
•	Analyse the AS-IS Scenarios and design the TO-BE business process flow with the Solution Architect
•	Working with Solution Architect during the design and blueprinting phases
•	Working with the business team for business use case development
•	Review the details of Business Requirement Document (BRD) and translate it into functional specifications.
•	Provides analytic support by coordinating data extraction from various databases and data interpretation.
•	Ensure that right practices are being followed while documenting requirements, by putting governance in place across different business domains. Review the requirement documents generated by team and suggest changes required if any.
•	Partners with development and analytic teams to provide reporting on software solutions.
•	Participates in Integration Testing and User Acceptance Testing (UAT) and Functionality Testing.

cust_name: 騰創數析股份有限公司
job_detail:
✅ 公司簡介
「騰創數析」係由新零售科技服務之領導廠商騰雲 (股票代號6870)，攜手資料科學團隊創代科技共同成立。整合雙方在市場實績、數據資源與分析技術等多元優勢，未來將持續以資料科學為核心，為政府及企業客戶提供專業、創新的應用服務。

我們的工作將經常接觸新興資訊科技、AI人工智慧、數據分析、資料視覺化、軟體開發及整合等議題，服務型態則是陪伴客戶共同構建解決方案、發掘數據洞見與價值，並提供專業的諮詢建議。期望您對這樣的工作內容具備基本認識、熱情與好奇心。

我們迄今的服務則遍及零售、交通、物流、航運、電信、能源、犯罪、災防等多元範疇，並持續向新領域擴張，能不斷提供全新的學習挑戰與成長機會。


✅ 基本能力需求
1. 了解資料倉儲設計規劃，有ODS概念。
2. 有零售行銷經驗尤佳。
3. 熟悉大型分散式系統。
4. 系統開發部署、驗證除錯、優化及版本控管維護。
5. 資料ETL、資料庫Schema設計、第三方服務串接。
6. 熟悉Java，具備獨立作業能力及後端開發5年以上工作經驗。
7. 熟悉資料庫軟體。

✅ 團隊管理能力需求
1.能進行團隊管理，並協助公司對預期專案進行技術的事前評估。
2. 掌控RD Team開發進度、調度資源與分配，並適時提供技術解惑，予以諮詢與協助。
3. 與PM端協作，依據專案或產品需求，進行設計開發。

✅ 薪資待遇
面議，保障年薪14個月。


✅ 公司福利
1. 彈性上下班時間(10:00-18:00)。
2. 不定期員工聚餐、免費午餐、下午茶、出遊團康活動。
3. 每年教育訓練補助。
4. 每年定期健康檢查。
5. 每年定期升遷考核與薪資調整。
6. 零食飲料櫃永遠補給充足，每位新進員工都保證先胖五公斤！

cust_name: 嘉實資訊股份有限公司
job_detail:
Job Description
1. 負責金融資訊產品的 server 端程式開發工作。
2. 以 C# 為主要程式開發語言，並使用 .NET Framework / .NET Core 作為開發框架。
3. 對程式設計有高度熱誠，能學習新技術的開發者。

工作地點：新北市

具軟體開發工作經驗者，需熟悉以下項目：
1. 軟體：ASP.NET MVC, C#,  JavaScript (加分), NodeJS (加分)
2. 系統環境：Windows Server 2012/2016, IIS 8.0/10.0, Linux 系統 (加分)
3. .NET 服務開發、佈署、問題處理
4. 軟體的分析、設計、程式撰寫與維護、性能優化…等，並進行軟體的測試與修改，有效控管軟體設計進度。
5. 能與產品部門、前端開發人員等相關人員，作緊密的分工配合。
6. 具備團隊合作精神，有良好的協同工作態度與工作熱誠。

無經驗者：
1.	限資工系/資管系/電機系/應數系等相關科系
2.	需修過物件導向程式設計/資料結構/演算法課程
3.	需附上成績單及程式開發相關作品
4.	至少熟悉一種程式語言 (如 C# / C / Java / Python / Go ..等)
5.	Design Pattern (加分)
6.	版本控制 Git / SVN / TFS


【5個你該來嘉實的理由】

◆ 活出「嘉實」，找得值得追求的企業願景 ◆

「嘉」，為善、幸福之意。投資不再讓少數人專美於前，我們矢志打造更便捷並讓分析資料更易取得的投資平台，為每個人及每個家庭找到專屬的理財規劃。

「實」，為實在、不造作之意。嘉實人做七分、講五分，以最真誠負責的態度研發每一項產品，並投入承諾做到最好。


◆ 產品創新，收入穩定成長 ◆

嘉實自創業累積超過20年專業經驗，於近期推出全台第一個自製的量化交易平台。連續10年股東權益報酬率都大於15%，上市櫃公司能達到此一標準者共只有36家；連續16年營收成長，上市櫃公司中能達到此一標準者只有4家。


◆ 以人為善，像家人般傾心相待 ◆

我們彼此信任，對於公司發展、產品規劃資訊從不藏私；我們相互扶持，設有職涯與身心諮詢機制，安排專屬peer與buddy一同學習成長；我們共享喜悅，每年不定期舉辦產品慶功與年節聚會、餐敘，創造和夥伴們的連結與互動。


◆ 友善職場，體驗最自在溫馨的工作環境與企業文化 ◆ 

重視工作與生活間的平衡，制定較彈性的上班工時與較寬鬆且優於勞基法的休假制度，同時備有專屬人體工學椅、豐盛零食與自動咖啡機等等，提供夥伴們適度的休閒空間，療癒身心並補充精力。


◆ 如果你也喜歡投資，就別猶豫了，快來開啟你的斜槓人生 ◆ 

在嘉實，公司開發的產品都能免費使用，每位夥伴都是產品使用者，更是產品的發想者。我們不定時邀請財經專家，舉辦投資講座相互分享切磋，快帶著你對投資理財的熱忱，和對財富自由的嚮往，與一群志同道合的同伴相遇吧!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------

也歡迎至官網投遞履歷與了解更多細節: https://www.sysjust.com.tw/。

skill: 軟體程式設計, 網頁語法撰寫

* 具備優秀的英語口語及書面表達能力，能夠與分佈在北美的技術及非技術人員進行溝通。能夠遵循主管的指導方針，致力於提供給客戶最好的軟體操作體驗。
